N.symptoms: Feuilles âgées jaunes, croissance ralentie, tiges fines, faible développement foliaire.

effects.deficiency: Réduction du rendement, faible croissance végétative, floraison et fructification limitées.
effects.excess: Croissance excessive des feuilles au détriment des fruits, sensibilité accrue aux maladies.

N.correction: Appliquer des engrais azotés (urée, nitrate d'ammonium), éviter les excès, fractionner les apports selon les stades.

en.symptoms: Older leaves yellow, slow growth, thin stems, poor leaf development.
en.deficiency: Reduced yield, poor vegetative growth, limited flowering and fruiting.
en.excess: Excessive leaf growth to the detriment of fruit, increased susceptibility to disease.
en.correction: Apply nitrogen fertilizers (urea, ammonium nitrate), avoid excess, divide the contributions according to the stages.

zh.symptoms: 老叶发黄，生长缓慢，茎细，叶片发育不良。
zh.deficiency: 产量下降，营养生长不良，开花结果受限。
zh.excess: 叶片过度生长会损害果实，增加患病的可能性。
zh.correction: 施用氮肥（尿素、硝酸铵），避免过量，按阶段分次施用。

hi.symptoms: पुरानी पत्तियां पीली, धीमी वृद्धि, पतले तने, खराब पत्ती विकास।
hi.deficiency: कम उपज, खराब वनस्पति विकास, सीमित फूल और फलन।
hi.excess: पत्तियों की अत्यधिक वृद्धि से फलों को नुकसान पहुंचता है, तथा रोग की संभावना बढ़ जाती है।
hi.correction: नाइट्रोजन उर्वरक (यूरिया, अमोनियम नाइट्रेट) का प्रयोग करें, अधिक मात्रा से बचें, चरणों के अनुसार योगदान को विभाजित करें।

es.symptoms: Hojas más viejas amarillas, crecimiento lento, tallos delgados, desarrollo deficiente de las hojas.
es.deficiency: Rendimiento reducido, crecimiento vegetativo deficiente, floración y fructificación limitadas.
es.excess: Crecimiento excesivo de hojas en detrimento del fruto, mayor susceptibilidad a enfermedades.
es.correction: Aplicar fertilizantes nitrogenados (urea, nitrato de amonio), evitar el exceso, dividir los aportes según las etapas.

fr.symptoms: Feuilles âgées jaunes, croissance ralentie, tiges fines, faible développement foliaire.
fr.deficiency: Réduction du rendement, faible croissance végétative, floraison et fructification limitées.
fr.excess: Croissance excessive des feuilles au détriment des fruits, sensibilité accrue aux maladies.
fr.correction: Appliquer des engrais azotés (urée, nitrate d'ammonium), éviter les excès, fractionner les apports selon les stades.

sw.symptoms: Majani ya zamani ya manjano, ukuaji wa polepole, shina nyembamba, ukuaji duni wa majani.
sw.deficiency: Kupungua kwa mavuno, ukuaji duni wa mimea, maua machache na matunda.
sw.excess: Ukuaji wa majani kupita kiasi kwa madhara ya matunda, kuongezeka kwa uwezekano wa magonjwa.
sw.correction: Omba mbolea za nitrojeni (urea, nitrati ya ammoniamu), epuka kupita kiasi, ugawanye michango kulingana na hatua.

ha.symptoms: Manya-manyan ganye rawaya, jinkirin girma, mai tushe na bakin ciki, ƙarancin ci gaban ganye.
ha.deficiency: Rage yawan amfanin ƙasa, ƙarancin ci gaban ciyayi, ƙarancin fure da 'ya'yan itace.
ha.excess: Girman ganye mai yawa don lalata 'ya'yan itace, ƙara yawan kamuwa da cuta.
ha.correction: Aiwatar da takin nitrogen (urea, ammonium nitrate), kauce wa wuce haddi, raba gudummawar bisa ga matakai.

yo.symptoms: Agbalagba ewe ofeefee, o lọra idagbasoke, tinrin stems, ko dara bunkun idagbasoke.
yo.deficiency: Idinku ti o dinku, idagbasoke ewe ti ko dara, aladodo lopin ati eso.
yo.excess: Idagba ewe ti o pọ si ipalara ti eso, ifaragba si arun.
yo.correction: Waye awọn ajile nitrogen (urea, iyọ ammonium), yago fun apọju, pin awọn ifunni ni ibamu si awọn ipele.

ig.symptoms: Ochie epupụta edo edo, ngwa ngwa ibu, mkpa ị ga, ogbenye akwukwo mmepe.
ig.deficiency: Mbelata nke mkpụrụ osisi, uto ahịhịa na-adịghị mma, obere ifuru na ịmị mkpụrụ.
ig.excess: Oke akwukwo uto na-emebi mkpụrụ osisi, enwekwu ike ibute ọrịa.
ig.correction: Tinye nitrogen fatịlaịza (urea, ammonium nitrate), zere ngafe, kesaa onyinye dị ka usoro.

am.symptoms: የቆዩ ቅጠሎች ቢጫ, ዘገምተኛ እድገት, ቀጭን ግንዶች, ደካማ ቅጠል እድገት.
am.deficiency: ዝቅተኛ ምርት, ደካማ የእፅዋት እድገት, ውስን አበባ እና ፍራፍሬ.
am.excess: ፍራፍሬን ለመጉዳት ከመጠን በላይ የቅጠል እድገት, ለበሽታ ተጋላጭነት ይጨምራል.
am.correction: የናይትሮጅን ማዳበሪያዎችን (ዩሪያ, አሚዮኒየም ናይትሬትን) ይተግብሩ, ከመጠን በላይ ያስወግዱ, መዋጮዎችን በደረጃዎች ይከፋፍሉ.

om.symptoms: Baaloonni dullooman keelloo, guddina suuta, hidda haphii, guddina baala gaarii hin qabne.
om.deficiency: Omishni hir’achuu, guddinni biqiltootaa gaarii hin taane, daraaraa fi firii daangeffame.
om.excess: Guddinni baala garmalee firii miidhuu, saaxilamummaa dhukkuba dabaluu.
om.correction: Xaa’oo naayitiroojiinii (yuriyaa, amooniyeemii naayitreetii) dibachuu, garmalee irraa fagaachuu, gumaacha sadarkaa sadarkaan qooduu.

rw.symptoms: Amababi ashaje akura umuhondo, gukura gahoro, ibiti bito, gukura nabi kwamababi.
rw.deficiency: Kugabanya umusaruro, gukura nabi kw'ibimera, indabyo nke n'imbuto.
rw.excess: Gukura kwamababi menshi kwangiza imbuto, kongera kwandura indwara.
rw.correction: Koresha ifumbire ya azote (urea, nitrati ya amonium), irinde ibirenze, ugabanye imisanzu ukurikije ibyiciro.

ln.symptoms: Nkasa ya kala ezali jaune, ekolaka malembe, matiti ya mikemike, nkasa ekola malamu te.
ln.deficiency: Bokiti ya mbuma, bokoli ya mabe ya banzete, bokasi ya fololo mpe mbuma.
ln.excess: Kokola ya nkasa mingi na kobebisa mbuma, ebakisaki susceptibilité ya bokono.
ln.correction: Pakola ba engrais azote (urée, nitrate d’ammonium), koboya kolekisa ndelo, kabola ba contributions selon ba étapes.

sn.symptoms: Mashizha akakura eyero, kukura zvishoma nezvishoma, madzinde matete, kusakura zvakanaka kweshizha.
sn.deficiency: Kuderera kwegoho, kusakura kwezvinomera, maruva mashoma uye fruiting.
sn.excess: Kuwedzera kwemashizha kukura kune kukanganisa kwezvibereko, kuwedzera kubatwa nechirwere.
sn.correction: Isa nitrogen fertilizer (urea, ammonium nitrate), dzivisa kuwandisa, patsanura mipiro maererano nematanho.

tn.symptoms: Matlhare a kgale a bosetlha, kgolo e e bonya, dikutu tse di sesane, kgolo e e bokoa ya matlhare.
tn.deficiency: Thobo e e fokotsegileng, kgolo e e bokoa ya dimela, go thunya go go lekanyeditsweng le go ungwa ga maungo.
tn.excess: Kgolo e e feteletseng ya matlhare go gobatsa maungo, go oketsega ga go tlhaselega ga malwetse.
tn.correction: Dirisa menontsha ya naeterojene (urea, ammonium nitrate), tila go feta selekanyo, arola meneelo go ya ka dikgato.

st.symptoms: Makhasi a khale a mosehla, kholo e liehang, lithupa tse tšesaane, tsoelo-pele e mpe ea makhasi.
st.deficiency: Kotulo e fokotsehileng, kholo e fokolang ea limela, lipalesa tse fokolang le litholoana.
st.excess: Ho hola ho feteletseng ha makhasi ho senya litholoana, ho ba le monyetla oa ho kula.
st.correction: Sebelisa menontsha ea naetrojene (urea, ammonium nitrate), qoba ho feteletseng, arola menehelo ho ea ka mekhahlelo.

mg.symptoms: Ny raviny efa antitra dia mavomavo, miadana ny fitomboana, manify ny tahony, ratsy ny fivoaran'ny ravina.
mg.deficiency: Mihena ny vokatra, mahantra ny fitomboan'ny zavamaniry, voafetra ny voninkazo sy ny voankazo.
mg.excess: Ny fitomboan'ny ravina be loatra ka manimba ny voankazo, mihamitombo ny mety hisian'ny aretina.
mg.correction: Ampiharo zezika azota (urea, ammonium nitrate), misoroka ny tafahoatra, zarao ny anjara araka ny dingana.

wo.symptoms: Xob yu màgget yi dañu mboq, màgg ndànk, yaram yu sew yi, xob yi duñu màgg bu baax.
wo.deficiency: Ndax lu néew, màggug vegetatif bu baaxul, tóor-tóor ak meññeef yu néew.
wo.excess: Màgg xob yu bari te mën na gàllankoor meññeef yi, gëna yomba am feebar.
wo.correction: Defal fertilisan te am azot (urée, nitrate d'ammonium), moytu lu ëpp, xaaj li ngay joxe ci etape yi.

bm.symptoms: A bulu kɔrɔw bɛ jɛ, u bɛ falen dɔɔni dɔɔni, u buluw ka fin, u buluw tɛ yiriwa.
bm.deficiency: Sɛnɛfɛnw sɔrɔli dɔgɔyali, jiriw falenbaliya, falenfɛnw ni den sɔrɔli danma.
bm.excess: Furaw falen kojugu ka jiridenw tiɲɛ, o bɛ dɔ fara banaw sɔrɔli kan.
bm.correction: Aw bɛ azote bagajiw (urea, amonium nitrate) kɛ, aw bɛ aw yɛrɛ tanga kojugu ma, ka bolomafaraw tila ka kɛɲɛ ni taabolo ye.

ts.symptoms: Matluka ya khale yava yotshuka, ya kula hiku nonoka, swirhabyani swo olova, kukula kahle ka matluka.
ts.deficiency: Kuhunguteka ka mbuyelo, kukula kahle ka swimilani, ku pfumaleka ka swiluva na mihandzu.
ts.excess: Kukula ngopfu ka matluka kuva swi onha mihandzu, swiendla leswaku kuva na mavabyi lawa yanga khomiwa hi mavabyi.
ts.correction: Chela manyoro ya nitrogen (urea, ammonium nitrate), papalata ku tlula mpimo, avanyisa minyikelo kuya hi switeji.

P.symptoms: Feuilles vert foncé avec teinte pourpre, racines peu développées, croissance lente.

effects.deficiency: Retard de croissance, faible enracinement, réduction du rendement.
effects.excess: Blocage de l’absorption du zinc et du fer, déséquilibre nutritionnel.

P.correction: Utiliser du superphosphate ou du phosphate naturel, ajuster le pH du sol pour améliorer la disponibilité.

en.symptoms: Dark green leaves with purple tint, poorly developed roots, slow growth.
en.deficiency: Stunted growth, poor rooting, reduced yield.
en.excess: Blockage of zinc and iron absorption, nutritional imbalance.
en.correction: Use superphosphate or rock phosphate, adjust soil pH to improve availability.

zh.symptoms: 叶片深绿色，带紫色，根部发育不良，生长缓慢。
zh.deficiency: 生长不良，生根不良，产量降低。
zh.excess: 锌、铁吸收受阻，营养不平衡。
zh.correction: 使用过磷酸钙或磷矿，调节土壤pH值以提高可用性。

hi.symptoms: बैंगनी रंग के साथ गहरे हरे पत्ते, खराब विकसित जड़ें, धीमी वृद्धि।
hi.deficiency: अवरुद्ध विकास, खराब जड़ें, कम उपज।
hi.excess: जिंक और आयरन के अवशोषण में रुकावट, पोषण असंतुलन।
hi.correction: सुपरफॉस्फेट या रॉक फॉस्फेट का प्रयोग करें, उपलब्धता में सुधार के लिए मिट्टी का पीएच समायोजित करें।

es.symptoms: Hojas de color verde oscuro con tinte púrpura, raíces poco desarrolladas, crecimiento lento.
es.deficiency: Crecimiento atrofiado, enraizamiento deficiente, rendimiento reducido.
es.excess: Bloqueo de la absorción de zinc y hierro, desequilibrio nutricional.
es.correction: Utilice superfosfato o fosfato de roca y ajuste el pH del suelo para mejorar la disponibilidad.

fr.symptoms: Feuilles vert foncé avec teinte pourpre, racines peu développées, croissance lente.
fr.deficiency: Retard de croissance, faible enracinement, réduction du rendement.
fr.excess: Blocage de l’absorption du zinc et du fer, déséquilibre nutritionnel.
fr.correction: Utiliser du superphosphate ou du phosphate naturel, ajuster le pH du sol pour améliorer la disponibilité.

sw.symptoms: Majani ya kijani kibichi na tint ya zambarau, mizizi isiyokua vizuri, ukuaji wa polepole.
sw.deficiency: Ukuaji uliodumaa, mizizi duni, kupungua kwa mavuno.
sw.excess: Uzuiaji wa ngozi ya zinki na chuma, usawa wa lishe.
sw.correction: Tumia superfosfati au fosfati ya mawe, rekebisha pH ya udongo ili kuboresha upatikanaji.

ha.symptoms: Dark kore ganye tare da purple tint, talauci raya tushen, jinkirin girma.
ha.deficiency: Rashin girma, rashin tushen tushe, rage yawan amfanin ƙasa.
ha.excess: Toshewar zinc da jan ƙarfe, rashin daidaituwa na abinci.
ha.correction: Yi amfani da superphosphate ko dutse phosphate, daidaita ƙasa pH don inganta samuwa.

yo.symptoms: Awọn ewe alawọ ewe dudu pẹlu tint eleyi ti, awọn gbongbo ti ko ni idagbasoke, idagbasoke ti o lọra.
yo.deficiency: Idagba ti ko dara, rutini ti ko dara, ikore ti o dinku.
yo.excess: Idilọwọ ti sinkii ati gbigba irin, aiṣedeede ijẹẹmu.
yo.correction: Lo superphosphate tabi apata fosifeti, ṣatunṣe pH ile lati mu ilọsiwaju sii.

ig.symptoms: Ọchịchịrị green epupụta na-acha odo odo tint, emezighituri mepụtara mgbọrọgwụ, ngwa ngwa ibu.
ig.deficiency: Ntọhapụ nke uto, mgbọrọgwụ dara ogbenye, mbelata mkpụrụ.
ig.excess: Mgbochi nke zinc na absorption nke ígwè, enweghị nri na-edozi ahụ.
ig.correction: Jiri superphosphate ma ọ bụ nkume phosphate, dozie ala pH iji melite nnweta.

am.symptoms: ጥቁር አረንጓዴ ቅጠሎች ከሐምራዊ ቀለም ፣ በደንብ ያልዳበሩ ሥሮች ፣ ዘገምተኛ እድገት።
am.deficiency: የተዳከመ እድገት, ደካማ ሥር, የምርት መቀነስ.
am.excess: የዚንክ እና የብረት መሳብ መዘጋት, የተመጣጠነ ምግብ አለመመጣጠን.
am.correction: ሱፐርፎፌት ወይም ሮክ ፎስፌት ይጠቀሙ፣ ተገኝነትን ለማሻሻል የአፈርን ፒኤች ያስተካክሉ።

om.symptoms: Baalli magariisa dukkanaa’aa kan ta’ee fi halluu diimaa kan qabu, hundeen isaa haala gaarii hin taane kan guddate, suuta kan guddatu dha.
om.deficiency: Guddinni isaa duubatti deebi’uu, hiddi isaa gaarii hin taane, oomishni hir’achuu.
om.excess: Xuuxamuu ziinkii fi ayirenii cufuu, madaallii soorataa dhabuu.
om.correction: Superphosphate ykn rock phosphate fayyadamuu, pH biyyee sirreessuun argama fooyyessuu.

rw.symptoms: Amababi yicyatsi yijimye afite ibara ryijimye, imizi idakuze neza, gukura buhoro.
rw.deficiency: Gukura guhagarara, gushinga imizi nabi, kugabanya umusaruro.
rw.excess: Guhagarika zinc hamwe no kwinjiza fer, kutagira imirire.
rw.correction: Koresha superphosifate cyangwa fosifate y'urutare, hindura ubutaka pH kugirango utezimbere kuboneka.

ln.symptoms: Nkasa ya vert foncé na teinte violet, misisa oyo ekoli malamu te, ekolaka malembe.
ln.deficiency: Bokoli ya kokita, misisa ya mabe, mbuma ekiti.
ln.excess: Blocage ya absorption ya zinc na fer, déséquilibre nutritionnel.
ln.correction: Salelá superphosphate to phosphate ya mabanga, bongisa pH ya mabele mpo na kobongisa bozali.

sn.symptoms: Mashizha akasvibira ane ruvara rwepepuru, midzi isina kukura, inononoka kukura.
sn.deficiency: Kuremara kukura, kusadzika kwemidzi, kuderera kwegoho.
sn.excess: Kuvharika kwe zinc uye kunyura kwesimbi, kusaenzana kwehutano.
sn.correction: Shandisa superphosphate kana rock phosphate, gadzirisa ivhu pH kuti uvandudze kuwanikwa.

tn.symptoms: Makhasi a matala a lefifi a nang le mmala wa pherese, metso e sa ntshetswa pele hantle, kgolo e bonya.
tn.deficiency: Kgolo e e fokotsegileng, medi e e bokoa, thobo e e fokotsegileng.
tn.excess: Thibelo ya zinki le tshipi monyelo, phepo e nepahetseng ho se lekalekane.
tn.correction: Dirisa superphosphate kgotsa phosphate ya letlapa, baakanya pH ya mmu go tokafatsa go nna teng.

st.symptoms: Makhasi a matala a lefifi a nang le tint e pherese, metso e sa ntlafatsoang hantle, kholo e liehang.
st.deficiency: Khōlo e tsitsitseng, metso e fokolang, chai e fokotsehileng.
st.excess: Ho thibela ho kenngoa ha zinki le tšepe, ho se leka-lekane ha phepo e nepahetseng.
st.correction: Sebelisa superphosphate kapa rock phosphate, fetola pH ea mobu ho ntlafatsa ho fumaneha.

mg.symptoms: Ravina maitso matroka misy loko volomparasy, fakan-drivotra tsy mivoatra, miadana ny fitomboana.
mg.deficiency: Tazonina ny fitomboana, ny fakany ratsy, ny fihenan'ny vokatra.
mg.excess: Ny fanakanana ny zinc sy ny vy, ny tsy fifandanjana ara-tsakafo.
mg.correction: Mampiasà superphosphate na rock phosphate, ampifanaraho amin'ny pH ny tany mba hanatsarana ny fisiany.

wo.symptoms: Xob yu wert yu lëndëm ak melo violet, reen gu màggul bu baax, màgg gu yeex.
wo.deficiency: Màgg gu yeex, reen gu néew, meññeef gu néew.
wo.excess: Fatt absorption zinc ak fer, desequilibre nutritionel.
wo.correction: Jëfandikool superfosfaat wala fosfaat xeer, nga xawa jekkal pH suuf si ngir gëna mëna am.

bm.symptoms: A buluw ye bulama dibiman ye ni u ɲɛ ye bulama ye, u ju ma yiriwa, u bɛ falen dɔɔni dɔɔni.
bm.deficiency: Kɛnɛya sabatili, jirisunw sɛnɛbaliya, sɛnɛfɛnw sɔrɔli dɔgɔyali.
bm.excess: Zɛnki ni nɛgɛ tali balili, balodɛsɛ.
bm.correction: Aw bɛ superphosphate walima fara fositɛri kɛ, ka dugukolo pH ladilan walasa ka sɔrɔ ka ɲɛ.

ts.symptoms: Matluka ya rihlaza ro dzwihala na muhlovo wa purple, timintsu letinga kulangiki kahle, kukula hiku nonoka.
ts.deficiency: Kukula lokunga tsandzeka, ku dzima timintsu lokunga kahle, kuhunguteka ka mbuyelo.
ts.excess: Ku siveriwa ka ku amukeriwa ka zinc na iron, ku nga ringani ka swakudya.
ts.correction: Tirhisa superphosphate kumbe rock phosphate, lulamisa pH ya misava kuva yi antswisa vukona.

K.symptoms: Brûlure des bords des feuilles, chlorose marginale, fruits mal formés.

effects.deficiency: Faible résistance au stress hydrique, réduction de la qualité des fruits.
effects.excess: Interférence avec l’absorption du magnésium et du calcium.

K.correction: Appliquer du sulfate ou chlorure de potassium, éviter les excès sur sols légers.

en.symptoms: Leaf edge burn, marginal chlorosis, malformed fruits.
en.deficiency: Low resistance to water stress, reduced fruit quality.
en.excess: Interference with the absorption of magnesium and calcium.
en.correction: Apply potassium sulfate or chloride, avoid excess on light soils.

zh.symptoms: 叶缘灼伤，边缘失绿，果实畸形。
zh.deficiency: 抵抗水分胁迫能力低，果实品质下降。
zh.correction: 施用硫酸钾或氯化钾，避免在轻质土壤上过量使用。

hi.symptoms: पत्ती के किनारे जलना, सीमांत हरितहीनता, विकृत फल।
hi.deficiency: जल तनाव के प्रति कम प्रतिरोध, फल की गुणवत्ता में कमी।
hi.excess: मैग्नीशियम और कैल्शियम के अवशोषण में हस्तक्षेप।
hi.correction: पोटेशियम सल्फेट या क्लोराइड का प्रयोग करें, हल्की मिट्टी पर अधिक प्रयोग से बचें।

es.symptoms: Quemadura en el borde de las hojas, clorosis marginal, frutos malformados.
es.deficiency: Baja resistencia al estrés hídrico, calidad reducida del fruto.
es.excess: Interferencia con la absorción de magnesio y calcio.
es.correction: Aplicar sulfato o cloruro de potasio, evitar el exceso en suelos ligeros.

fr.symptoms: Brûlure des bords des feuilles, chlorose marginale, fruits mal formés.
fr.deficiency: Faible résistance au stress hydrique, réduction de la qualité des fruits.
fr.excess: Interférence avec l’absorption du magnésium et du calcium.
fr.correction: Appliquer du sulfate ou chlorure de potassium, éviter les excès sur sols légers.

sw.symptoms: Kuungua kwa makali ya majani, chlorosis ya kando, matunda yaliyoharibika.
sw.deficiency: Upinzani mdogo kwa dhiki ya maji, kupunguza ubora wa matunda.
sw.excess: Kuingilia kati na ngozi ya magnesiamu na kalsiamu.
sw.correction: Omba sulfate ya potasiamu au kloridi, epuka kupita kiasi kwenye mchanga mwepesi.

ha.symptoms: Kone gefen ganye, chlorosis na gefe, 'ya'yan itace mara kyau.
ha.deficiency: Ƙananan juriya ga matsalolin ruwa, rage yawan 'ya'yan itace.
ha.excess: Tsangwama tare da sha na magnesium da calcium.
ha.correction: Aiwatar da potassium sulfate ko chloride, kauce wa wuce haddi akan kasa mai haske.

yo.symptoms: Ijinna eti ewe, chlorosis ala, awọn eso ti ko dara.
yo.deficiency: Low resistance to omi wahala, din eso didara.
yo.excess: Kikọlu pẹlu gbigba iṣuu magnẹsia ati kalisiomu.
yo.correction: Waye potasiomu sulfate tabi kiloraidi, yago fun apọju lori awọn ile ina.

ig.symptoms: Ọkụ n'ọnụ akwụkwọ, oke chlorosis, mkpụrụ osisi na-adịghị mma.
ig.deficiency: Obere iguzogide nrụgide mmiri, belata àgwà mkpụrụ osisi.
ig.excess: Ntinye aka na ntinye nke magnesium na calcium.
ig.correction: Tinye potassium sulfate ma ọ bụ chloride, zere ịfefe na ala ọkụ.

am.symptoms: የቅጠል ጠርዝ ማቃጠል, የኅዳግ ክሎሮሲስ, የተበላሹ ፍራፍሬዎች.
am.deficiency: የውሃ ውጥረት ዝቅተኛ መቋቋም, የፍራፍሬ ጥራት ይቀንሳል.
am.excess: ማግኒዥየም እና ካልሲየም በመምጠጥ ላይ ጣልቃ መግባት.
am.correction: ፖታስየም ሰልፌት ወይም ክሎራይድ ይተግብሩ, በቀላል አፈር ላይ ከመጠን በላይ ያስወግዱ.

om.symptoms: Gubachuu qarqara baala, kilooroosii marginal, firiiwwan bifa hin qabne.
om.deficiency: Dhiibbaa bishaanii dandamachuu gadi aanaa, qulqullina firii hir’isuu.
om.excess: Xuuxamuu maagniziyeemii fi kaalsiyeemii gidduu seenuun.
om.correction: Pootaasiyeem salfeet ykn kilooraayidii dibachuu, biyyee salphaa irratti garmalee fayyadamuu irraa fagaachuu.

rw.symptoms: Ibibabi byaka, chlorose marginal, imbuto zidahwitse.
rw.deficiency: Kurwanya imbaraga nke zamazi, kugabanya ubwiza bwimbuto.
rw.excess: Kwivanga no kwinjiza magnesium na calcium.
rw.correction: Koresha potasiyumu sulfate cyangwa chloride, irinde kurenza kubutaka bworoshye.

ln.symptoms: Kozika ya nsɔngɛ ya nkasa, chlorose marginale, mbuma oyo esalemi malamu te.
ln.deficiency: Résistance moke na stress ya mayi, qualité ya mbuma ekiti.
ln.excess: Interférence na absorption ya magnésium na calcium.
ln.correction: Pakola sulfate de potassium to chlorure, koboya kolekisa ndelo na mabele ya pete.

sn.symptoms: Kupisa kweshizha, marginal chlorosis, michero isina kunaka.
sn.deficiency: Kudzikira kuderera kwekunetseka kwemvura, kuderedzwa kwemhando yezvibereko.
sn.excess: Kukanganisa nekutorwa kwe magnesium uye calcium.
sn.correction: Isa potassium sulfate kana chloride, dzivisa kuwandisa paivhu rakareruka.

tn.symptoms: Go fisiwa ga molelwane wa matlhare, chlorosis ya molelwane, maungo a a sa bopegang sentle.
tn.deficiency: Kganetso e e kwa tlase ya kgatelelo ya metsi, boleng jo bo fokoditsweng jwa leungo.
tn.excess: Tshitiso le monyelo ya magnesium le khalsiamo.
tn.correction: Tshela potasiamo sulfate kgotsa chloride, tila pheteletso mo mebung e e botlhofo.

st.symptoms: Ho chesoa ha makhasi, marginal chlorosis, litholoana tse sa sebetseng hantle.
st.deficiency: Ho hanyetsa ho tlaase ho khatello ea metsi, ho fokotsa boleng ba litholoana.
st.excess: Ho kena-kenana le ho monya ha magnesium le calcium.
st.correction: Sebelisa potassium sulfate kapa chloride, qoba ho feteletseng mobung o bobebe.

mg.symptoms: May ny sisin'ny ravina, ny chlorose marginal, ny voankazo tsy mety.
mg.deficiency: Ny fanoherana ambany amin'ny adin'ny rano, ny fihenan'ny kalitaon'ny voankazo.
mg.excess: Ny fitsabahana amin'ny fidiran'ny magnesium sy calcium.
mg.correction: Mampiasà sulfate potassium na chloride, fadio ny tafahoatra amin'ny tany maivana.

wo.symptoms: Lakk bu tàng ci catu xob yi, chlorose ci catu xob yi, meññeef yu baaxul.
wo.deficiency: Resistance bu woyof ci stress ndox, wàññi kalite meññeef yi.
wo.excess: Dafay tere magnesium ak kalsium di naan.
wo.correction: Defal sulfate potassium wala chlorure, moytu ko ëpp ci suuf su woyof.

bm.symptoms: Furu dawolo jeni, kulorozi dafɛla, jiriden minnu ma dila.
bm.deficiency: Ji degunw kɛlɛli dɔgɔyali, jiridenw jogo dɔgɔyali.
bm.correction: Aw bɛ potasiyɔmu sulfate walima kuloridi kɛ a la, aw kana tɛmɛ a kan bɔgɔ nɔgɔlenw kan.

ts.symptoms: Ku hisiwa ka makumu ya matluka, marginal chlorosis, mihandzu leyi nga vumbekiki kahle.
ts.deficiency: Ku tiya ka le hansi eka ntshikelelo wa mati, kuhunguteka khwalithi ya mihandzu.
ts.excess: Ku kavanyetiwa ka ku amukeriwa ka magnesium na calcium.
ts.correction: Chela potassium sulfate kumbe chloride, papalata ku tlula mpimo eka misava yo vevuka.

Ca.symptoms: Nécrose des jeunes feuilles, pourriture apicale des fruits, racines faibles.

effects.deficiency: Déformation des fruits, chute prématurée, réduction du rendement.
effects.excess: Blocage du magnésium et du potassium, alcalinisation du sol.

Ca.correction: Utiliser du gypse ou de la chaux agricole, surveiller le pH et l’équilibre des cations.

en.symptoms: Necrosis of young leaves, blossom end rot of fruits, weak roots.
en.deficiency: Fruit deformation, premature drop, reduced yield.
en.excess: Blockage of magnesium and potassium, alkalization of the soil.
en.correction: Use gypsum or agricultural lime, monitor pH and cation balance.

zh.symptoms: 幼叶坏死、果实花蒂腐烂、根部脆弱。
zh.deficiency: 果实变形、过早掉落，产量降低。
zh.excess: 镁和钾的堵塞，土壤碱化。
zh.correction: 使用石膏或农业石灰，监测 pH 值和阳离子平衡。

hi.symptoms: युवा पत्तियों का परिगलन, फलों के पुष्प-अंत में सड़न, कमजोर जड़ें।
hi.deficiency: फल का विकृत होना, समय से पहले गिरना, उपज में कमी।
hi.excess: मैग्नीशियम और पोटेशियम का अवरोध, मिट्टी का क्षारीयकरण।
hi.correction: जिप्सम या कृषि चूने का प्रयोग करें, पीएच और धनायन संतुलन की निगरानी करें।

es.symptoms: Necrosis de hojas jóvenes, podredumbre apical de frutos, raíces débiles.
es.deficiency: Deformación del fruto, caída prematura, reducción del rendimiento.
es.excess: Bloqueo de magnesio y potasio, alcalinización del suelo.
es.correction: Utilice yeso o cal agrícola y controle el pH y el equilibrio de cationes.

fr.symptoms: Nécrose des jeunes feuilles, pourriture apicale des fruits, racines faibles.
fr.deficiency: Déformation des fruits, chute prématurée, réduction du rendement.
fr.excess: Blocage du magnésium et du potassium, alcalinisation du sol.
fr.correction: Utiliser du gypse ou de la chaux agricole, surveiller le pH et l’équilibre des cations.

sw.symptoms: Necrosis ya majani machanga, kuoza mwisho wa maua ya matunda, mizizi dhaifu.
sw.deficiency: Deformation ya matunda, kushuka mapema, kupunguza mavuno.
sw.excess: Uzuiaji wa magnesiamu na potasiamu, alkalization ya udongo.
sw.correction: Tumia jasi au chokaa cha kilimo, fuatilia pH na usawa wa cation.

ha.symptoms: Necrosis na matasa ganye, furanni karshen rot na 'ya'yan itatuwa, rauni tushen.
ha.deficiency: Nakasar 'ya'yan itace, faduwa da wuri, rage yawan amfanin ƙasa.
ha.excess: Blockage na magnesium da potassium, alkalization na ƙasa.
ha.correction: Yi amfani da gypsum ko lemun tsami na noma, saka idanu pH da ma'aunin cation.

yo.symptoms: Negirosisi ti odo leaves, Iruwe opin rot ti unrẹrẹ, lagbara wá.
yo.deficiency: Idibajẹ eso, sisọ ti tọjọ, ikore ti o dinku.
yo.excess: Blockage ti iṣuu magnẹsia ati potasiomu, alkalization ti ile.
yo.correction: Lo gypsum tabi orombo ogbin, ṣe atẹle pH ati iwọntunwọnsi cation.

ig.symptoms: Necrosis nke na-eto eto epupụta, ifuru ọgwụgwụ ire ere nke mkpụrụ osisi, na-adịghị ike mgbọrọgwụ.
ig.deficiency: Nrụrụ mkpụrụ osisi, ọdịda akaghi aka, mbelata mkpụrụ.
ig.excess: Mgbochi nke magnesium na potassium, alkalization nke ala.
ig.correction: Jiri gypsum ma ọ bụ lime ugbo, nyochaa pH na itule cation.

am.symptoms: የወጣት ቅጠሎች ኒክሮሲስ ፣ የፍራፍሬ መጨረሻ መበስበስ ፣ ደካማ ሥሮች ያብባሉ።
am.deficiency: የፍራፍሬ መበላሸት ፣ ያለጊዜው መውደቅ ፣ የምርት መቀነስ።
am.excess: የማግኒዚየም እና የፖታስየም መዘጋት, የአፈርን አልካላይዜሽን.
am.correction: የጂፕሰም ወይም የግብርና ሎሚ ይጠቀሙ፣ የፒኤች እና የኬቲን ሚዛን ይቆጣጠሩ።

om.symptoms: Necrosis baala dargaggoo, daraaraa dhuma manca’uu firii, hiddi dadhabaa.
om.deficiency: Difoormeeshinii firii, yeroo malee kufaatii, oomishni hir’achuu.
om.excess: Cufamuu maagniziyeemii fi pootaasiyeemii, alkaalaayizeeshinii biyyee.
om.correction: Jiipsii ykn liim qonnaa fayyadamuu, pH fi madaallii kaatiyoonii hordofuu.

rw.symptoms: Necrosis yamababi akiri mato, indabyo zirangirira kubora kwimbuto, imizi idakomeye.
rw.deficiency: Guhindura imbuto, kugabanuka imburagihe, kugabanya umusaruro.
rw.excess: Guhagarika magnesium na potasiyumu, alkalisation yubutaka.
rw.correction: Koresha gypsumu cyangwa lime yubuhinzi, ukurikirane pH hamwe nuburinganire.

ln.symptoms: Nécrose ya nkasa ya bilenge, fleur fin rot ya ba fruits, misisa ya faible.
ln.deficiency: Déformation ya mbuma, chute précoce, rendement ekiti.
ln.excess: Blocage ya magnésium na potassium, alcalisation ya mabele.
ln.correction: Salelá gypse to lime agricole, monitor pH mpe équilibre ya cation.

sn.symptoms: Necrosis yemashizha maduku, maruva ekupedzisira kuora kwezvibereko, midzi isina simba.
sn.deficiency: Michero deformation, kudonha nguva isati yakwana, goho rakaderedzwa.
sn.excess: Kuvharwa kwe magnesium uye potassium, alkalization yevhu.
sn.correction: Shandisa gypsum kana lime yekurima, tarisa pH uye cation chiyero.

tn.symptoms: Necrosis ya makhasi a manyane, palesa qetellong bola tsa ditholwana, metso e fokolang.
tn.deficiency: Go senyega ga leungo, go wa pele ga nako, thobo e e fokotsegileng.
tn.excess: Thibelo ya magnesiamo le potasiamo, alkalization ya mobu.
tn.correction: Dirisa gypsum kgotsa kalaka ya temothuo, ela tlhoko pH le tekatekano ya cation.

st.symptoms: Necrosis ea makhasi a macha, ho bola ha litholoana, metso e fokolang.
st.deficiency: Deformation ea litholoana, ho theoha pele ho nako, chai e fokotsehileng.
st.excess: Ho thibela magnesium le potasiamo, alkalization ea mobu.
st.correction: Sebelisa gypsum kapa lime tsa temo, hlokomela pH le cation balance.

mg.symptoms: Necrosis ny tanora ravina, mamelana faran`ny lo ny voankazo, malemy fakany.
mg.deficiency: Voankazo deformation, mitete aloha loatra, mihena ny vokatra.
mg.excess: Ny fanakanana ny magnesium sy ny potasioma, ny alkalization ny tany.
mg.correction: Mampiasà gypsum na sokay fambolena, manara-maso ny pH sy ny fifandanjana cation.

wo.symptoms: Necrose ci xob yu ndaw yi, tóor-tóor yi jeex ci meññeef yi, reeni yu néew doole yi.
wo.deficiency: Deformaasioŋu meññeef, teel daanu, wàññi meññeef.
wo.excess: Bloke magnesium ak potassium, alkalisasioŋ suuf si.
wo.correction: Jëfandikool gypsum wala chaux agricole, nga saytu pH ak ekilibre kation.

bm.symptoms: Furu denmisɛnninw ka nekɔrɔsi, jiridenw falen laban toli, u ju barikamaw.
bm.deficiency: Jiridenw bɔgɔbɔli, u jiginni ka kɔn a waati ɲɛ, u ka sɔrɔ dɔgɔyali.
bm.excess: Manje ni potasiyɔmu balili, dugukolo alkali.
bm.correction: Aw bɛ jisuma walima sɛnɛfɛnw kɛ, ka pH ni katiyɔn balansi kɔlɔsi.

ts.symptoms: Necrosis ya matluka lamantsongo, blossom end rot ya mihandzu, timintsu leti tsaneke.
ts.deficiency: Ku onhaka ka mihandzu, ku wa ka ha ri na nkarhi, kuhunguteka ka mbuyelo.
ts.excess: Ku pfaleka ka magnesium na potassium, alkalization ya misava.
ts.correction: Tirhisa gypsum kumbe lime ya vurimi, languta pH na cation balance.

Mg.symptoms: Chlorose internervaire sur feuilles âgées, bord des feuilles enroulé.

effects.deficiency: Photosynthèse réduite, chute des feuilles, baisse de rendement.
effects.excess: Interférence avec le calcium et le potassium.

Mg.correction: Appliquer du sulfate de magnésium (sel d’Epsom) ou dolomie, éviter les excès de K.

en.symptoms: Interveinal chlorosis on older leaves, leaf margins rolled.
en.deficiency: Reduced photosynthesis, leaf drop, reduced yield.
en.correction: Apply magnesium sulfate (Epsom salt) or dolomite, avoid excess K.

zh.symptoms: 老叶脉间失绿，叶缘卷曲。
zh.deficiency: 光合作用降低，叶子掉落，产量降低。
zh.correction: 涂抹硫酸镁（泻盐）或白云石，避免过量钾。

hi.symptoms: पुरानी पत्तियों पर अन्तरशिरा हरितहीनता, पत्ती के किनारे मुड़े हुए।
hi.deficiency: प्रकाश संश्लेषण में कमी, पत्तियों का गिरना, उपज में कमी।
hi.excess: कैल्शियम और पोटेशियम के साथ हस्तक्षेप.
hi.correction: मैग्नीशियम सल्फेट (एप्सम नमक) या डोलोमाइट का प्रयोग करें, अधिक मात्रा में के. का प्रयोग न करें।

es.symptoms: Clorosis intervenal en hojas más viejas, márgenes de las hojas enrollados.
es.deficiency: Fotosíntesis reducida, caída de hojas, rendimiento reducido.
es.excess: Interferencia con el calcio y el potasio.
es.correction: Aplicar sulfato de magnesio (sal de Epsom) o dolomita, evitar el exceso de K.

fr.symptoms: Chlorose internervaire sur feuilles âgées, bord des feuilles enroulé.
fr.deficiency: Photosynthèse réduite, chute des feuilles, baisse de rendement.
fr.excess: Interférence avec le calcium et le potassium.
fr.correction: Appliquer du sulfate de magnésium (sel d’Epsom) ou dolomie, éviter les excès de K.

sw.symptoms: Klorosisi ya kuingilia kati kwenye majani ya zamani, kando ya jani imevingirwa.
sw.deficiency: Kupunguza photosynthesis, kushuka kwa majani, kupungua kwa mavuno.
sw.excess: Kuingilia kati na kalsiamu na potasiamu.
sw.correction: Tumia salfati ya magnesiamu (chumvi ya Epsom) au dolomite, epuka K kupita kiasi.

ha.symptoms: Chlorosis na tsaka-tsaki akan tsofaffin ganye, gefen ganye yana birgima.
ha.deficiency: Rage photosynthesis, raguwar ganye, rage yawan amfanin ƙasa.
ha.excess: Tsangwama tare da calcium da potassium.
ha.correction: Aiwatar da magnesium sulfate (Epsom gishiri) ko dolomite, kauce wa wuce haddi K.

yo.symptoms: chlorosis ti aarin lori awọn ewe agbalagba, awọn ala ewe ti yiyi.
yo.deficiency: Photosynthesis ti o dinku, jijẹ ewe, ikore ti o dinku.
yo.correction: Waye sulfate magnẹsia (iyo Epsom) tabi dolomite, yago fun apọju K.

ig.symptoms: Chlorosis interveinal na akwụkwọ ochie, a na-atụgharị akụkụ akwụkwọ.
ig.deficiency: Mbelata photosynthesis, ọdịda akwụkwọ, mbelata mkpụrụ.
ig.excess: Ntinye aka na calcium na potassium.
ig.correction: Tinye magnesium sulfate (nnu Epsom) ma ọ bụ dolomite, zere ngafe K.

am.symptoms: ኢንተርቬናል ክሎሮሲስ በአሮጌ ቅጠሎች ላይ, የቅጠል ህዳጎች ተንከባለሉ.
am.deficiency: የተቀነሰ ፎቶሲንተሲስ፣ የቅጠል መውደቅ፣ የምርት መቀነስ።
am.excess: በካልሲየም እና በፖታስየም ውስጥ ጣልቃ መግባት.
am.correction: ማግኒዚየም ሰልፌት (Epsom ጨው) ወይም ዶሎማይት ይተግብሩ ፣ ከመጠን በላይ ኬን ያስወግዱ።

om.symptoms: Kilooroosiin ujummoo gidduu baala dulloome irratti, qarri baalaatti kan marfame.
om.deficiency: Footosinteesiin hir’achuu, baala kufaatii, oomisha hir’achuu.
om.correction: Maagniziyeem salfeet (Epsom salt) ykn dolomite dibachuu, K garmalee irraa fagaachuu.

rw.symptoms: Indwara ya chlorose hagati yamababi ashaje, amababi yizunguruka.
rw.deficiency: Kugabanya fotosintezeza, guta amababi, kugabanya umusaruro.
rw.correction: Koresha magnesium sulfate (umunyu wa Epsom) cyangwa dolomite, irinde kurenza K.

ln.symptoms: Chlorose interveinale na nkasa ya kala, ba marges ya nkasa ebalusami.
ln.deficiency: Bokiti ya photosynthèse, bokiti ya nkasa, bokiti ya mbuma.
ln.correction: Pakola sulfate de magnésium (mungwa ya Epsom) to dolomite, koboya K oyo eleki.

sn.symptoms: Intervein chlorosis pamashizha akare, mashizha anotenderedzwa.
sn.deficiency: Yakaderedzwa photosynthesis, kudonha kwemashizha, kuderera kwegoho.
sn.correction: Isa magnesium sulfate (Epsom munyu) kana dolomite, dzivirira yakawandisa K.

tn.symptoms: Chlorosis ya magareng ga ditshika mo matlhareng a kgale, dintlha tsa matlhare di biditswe.
tn.deficiency: Go fokotsega ga photosynthesis, go wela ga matlhare, go fokotsega ga thobo.
tn.correction: Tshela makenesiamo salefeite (letswai la Epsom) kgotsa dolomite, tila K e e feteletseng.

st.symptoms: Intervein chlorosis makhasi a khale, mapheo a makhasi a phuthoa.
st.deficiency: Phokotso ea photosynthesis, lerotholi la makhasi, chai e fokotsehileng.
st.excess: Ho kena-kenana le calcium le potasiamo.
st.correction: Sebelisa magnesium sulfate (letsoai la Epsom) kapa dolomite, qoba ho feta K.

mg.symptoms: Chlorose interveinal amin'ny ravina efa lehibe, mihodinkodina ny sisin'ny ravina.
mg.deficiency: Nihena ny photosynthesis, ny firotsahan'ny ravina, ny fihenan'ny vokatra.
mg.correction: Mampiasà sulfate magnesium (sira Epsom) na dolomita, fadio ny K be loatra.

wo.symptoms: Chlorose interveine ci xob yu màgget yi, catu xob yi dañu laxasu.
wo.deficiency: Fotosente bu wàññeeku, xob yuy wàcci, meññeef yu wàññeeku.
wo.correction: Defal sulfate magnesium (xorom Epsom) wala dolomite, moytu K lu ëpp.

bm.symptoms: Kulorozi cɛmancɛ la furabulu kɔrɔw kan, furabuluw dawolo bɛ kurukuru.
bm.deficiency: Fotosintɛzi dɔgɔyali, furabuluw jigincogo, sɛnɛfɛnw sɔrɔli dɔgɔyali.
bm.correction: Aw bɛ sulfate de magnésium (Epsom kɔgɔ) walima dolomite kɛ a la, aw bɛ aw yɛrɛ tanga K tɛmɛnen ma.

ts.symptoms: Interveinal chlorosis eka matluka ya khale, matlhelo ya matluka ya rhendzeleka.
ts.deficiency: Kuhunguteka ka photosynthesis, ku hunguteka ka matluka, kuhunguteka ka mbuyelo.
ts.excess: Ku kavanyetiwa ka calcium na potassium.
ts.correction: Chela magnesium sulfate (Epsom salt) kumbe dolomite, papalata K yo tlula mpimo.

S.symptoms: Jaunissement des jeunes feuilles, croissance ralentie, tiges fines.

effects.deficiency: Réduction de la synthèse protéique, faible rendement.
effects.excess: Rare, mais peut acidifier le sol.

S.correction: Utiliser du sulfate d’ammonium ou de potassium, ou du gypse.

en.symptoms: Yellowing of young leaves, slowed growth, thin stems.
en.excess: Rare, but can acidify the soil.
en.correction: Use ammonium or potassium sulfate, or gypsum.

zh.symptoms: 幼叶变黄，生长缓慢，茎细。
zh.deficiency: 蛋白质合成减少，产量低。
zh.correction: 使用硫酸铵或硫酸钾，或石膏。

hi.symptoms: युवा पत्तियों का पीला पड़ना, धीमी वृद्धि, पतले तने।
hi.excess: दुर्लभ, लेकिन मिट्टी को अम्लीय बना सकता है।
hi.correction: अमोनियम या पोटेशियम सल्फेट, या जिप्सम का प्रयोग करें।

es.symptoms: Amarillamiento de hojas jóvenes, crecimiento lento, tallos delgados.
es.deficiency: Síntesis de proteínas reducida, bajo rendimiento.
es.excess: Raro, pero puede acidificar el suelo.
es.correction: Utilice sulfato de amonio o de potasio, o yeso.

fr.symptoms: Jaunissement des jeunes feuilles, croissance ralentie, tiges fines.
fr.deficiency: Réduction de la synthèse protéique, faible rendement.
fr.excess: Rare, mais peut acidifier le sol.
fr.correction: Utiliser du sulfate d’ammonium ou de potassium, ou du gypse.

sw.symptoms: Njano ya majani ya vijana, ukuaji wa polepole, shina nyembamba.
sw.deficiency: Kupunguza awali ya protini, mavuno ya chini.
sw.correction: Tumia amonia au sulfate ya potasiamu, au jasi.

ha.symptoms: Yellowing na matasa ganye, slowed girma, bakin ciki mai tushe.
ha.deficiency: Rage haɗin furotin, ƙananan yawan amfanin ƙasa.
ha.excess: Rare, amma zai iya acidify ƙasa.
ha.correction: Yi amfani da ammonium ko potassium sulfate, ko gypsum.

yo.symptoms: Yellowing ti odo leaves, slowed idagbasoke, tinrin stems.
yo.excess: Toje, ṣugbọn o le acidify ile.
yo.correction: Lo ammonium tabi potasiomu sulfate, tabi gypsum.

ig.symptoms: Yellowing na-eto eto epupụta, slowed ibu, mkpa ị ga.
ig.excess: Obere, ma nwere ike acidify ala.
ig.correction: Jiri ammonium ma ọ bụ potassium sulfate, ma ọ bụ gypsum.

am.symptoms: የወጣት ቅጠሎች ቢጫ, የዘገየ እድገት, ቀጭን ግንዶች.
am.excess: አልፎ አልፎ, ነገር ግን አፈርን አሲድ ሊያደርግ ይችላል.
am.correction: አሚዮኒየም ወይም ፖታስየም ሰልፌት ወይም ጂፕሰም ይጠቀሙ.

om.symptoms: Baalli dargaggeessaa keelloo ta’uu, guddinni suuta jechuu, hidda haphii ta’uu.
om.excess: Rare, garuu biyyee asiidii gochuu danda’a.
om.correction: Amooniyeemii ykn pootaasiyeem salfeet, ykn jipsamii fayyadamuu.

rw.symptoms: Umuhondo wamababi akiri mato, gukura gahoro, ibiti bito.
rw.deficiency: Kugabanya intungamubiri za poroteyine, umusaruro muke.
rw.correction: Koresha ammonium cyangwa potasiyumu sulfate, cyangwa gypsumu.

ln.symptoms: Kokóma jaune ya nkasa ya mikemike, kokola malɛmbɛmalɛmbɛ, matiti ya mikemike.
ln.deficiency: Synthèse ya proteine ​​ekitisami, rendement ya moke.
ln.excess: Rare, kasi ekoki ko acidifier mabele.
ln.correction: Salelá sulfate d’ammonium to potassium, to gypse.

sn.symptoms: Yellowing yemashizha maduku, kunonoka kukura, tsvina dzakatetepa.
sn.correction: Shandisa ammonium kana potassium sulfate, kana gypsum.

tn.symptoms: Yellowing ya matlhare a mannye, kgolo e e bonya, dikutu tse di sesane.
tn.excess: E sa tlwaelega, fela e ka dira gore mmu e nne asiti.
tn.correction: Dirisa ammoniamo kgotsa potasiamo salefeite, kgotsa jipisamo.

st.symptoms: Ho tšehla ha makhasi a manyenyane, khōlo e liehang, lithupa tse tšesaane.
st.deficiency: Ho fokotseha ha protheine synthesis, lihlahisoa tse fokolang.
st.excess: E sa tloaelehang, empa e ka etsa acidity mobung.
st.correction: Sebelisa ammonium kapa potassium sulfate, kapa gypsum.

mg.symptoms: Mavo ny ravina tanora, mihamitombo ny fitomboana, manify ny tahony.
mg.deficiency: Mihena ny proteinina synthesis, ambany ny vokatra.
mg.excess: Tsy fahita firy, fa afaka asidra ny tany.
mg.correction: Ampiasao ammonium na potassium sulfate, na gypsum.

wo.symptoms: Xob yu ndaw yi mboq, màgg gu yeex, petal yu sew.
wo.deficiency: Wàññi synthese protein, njuréef gu néew.
wo.excess: Néew na, waaye mën na asidloo suuf si.
wo.correction: Jëfandikool amonium wala sulfatu potaasiyom, wala gips.

bm.symptoms: A bulu denmisɛnninw bɛ jɛ, u falenni dɔɔni dɔɔni, u buluw bɛ fin.
bm.excess: A man teli, nka a bɛ se ka dugukolo asidi kɛ.
bm.correction: Aw bɛ amoniyɔmu walima sulfate potasiyɔmu, walima jipisi kɛ.

ts.symptoms: Ku tshwuka ka matluka lamantsongo, ku nonoka ku kula, swirhabyani swo olova.
ts.deficiency: Kuhunguteka ka ku endliwa ka ti protein, mbuyelo wale hansi.
ts.excess: A swi talanga, kambe swinga endla leswaku misava yiva na acid.
ts.correction: Tirhisa ammonium kumbe potassium sulfate, kumbe gypsum.

Fe.symptoms: Chlorose internervaire sur jeunes feuilles, feuilles presque blanches.

effects.excess: Toxicité sur sols acides, blocage du phosphore.

Fe.correction: Appliquer des chélates de fer (EDDHA, DTPA), corriger le pH si > 7.5.

en.symptoms: Interveinal chlorosis on young leaves, leaves almost white.
en.excess: Toxicity on acidic soils, phosphorus blocking.
en.correction: Apply iron chelates (EDDHA, DTPA), correct pH if > 7.5.

zh.symptoms: 幼叶脉间失绿，叶片几乎变白。
zh.deficiency: 光合作用减少，生长减缓。
zh.excess: 对酸性土壤有毒性，有阻磷作用。
zh.correction: 使用铁螯合物（EDDHA、DTPA），如果 pH 值 > 7.5，则校正 pH 值。

hi.symptoms: युवा पत्तियों पर अंतरशिरा हरितहीनता, पत्तियां लगभग सफेद।
hi.deficiency: प्रकाश संश्लेषण में कमी, विकास धीमा।
hi.excess: अम्लीय मिट्टी पर विषाक्तता, फास्फोरस अवरोधन।
hi.correction: आयरन कीलेट (EDDHA, DTPA) का प्रयोग करें, यदि pH > 7.5 हो तो उसे सही करें।

es.symptoms: Clorosis intervenal en hojas jóvenes, hojas casi blancas.
es.excess: Toxicidad en suelos ácidos, bloqueo del fósforo.
es.correction: Aplicar quelatos de hierro (EDDHA, DTPA), corregir el pH si > 7,5.

fr.symptoms: Chlorose internervaire sur jeunes feuilles, feuilles presque blanches.
fr.excess: Toxicité sur sols acides, blocage du phosphore.
fr.correction: Appliquer des chélates de fer (EDDHA, DTPA), corriger le pH si > 7.5.

sw.symptoms: Chlorosisi ya kuingilia kwenye majani machanga, huacha karibu nyeupe.
sw.deficiency: Kupungua kwa photosynthesis, kupungua kwa ukuaji.
sw.excess: Sumu kwenye udongo tindikali, kuzuia fosforasi.
sw.correction: Weka chelate za chuma (EDDHA, DTPA), sahihi pH ikiwa > 7.5.

ha.symptoms: Interveinal chlorosis a kan matasa ganye, bar kusan fari.
ha.excess: Guba akan ƙasa acidic, toshe phosphorus.
ha.correction: Aiwatar da ƙarfe chelates (EDDHA, DTPA), daidai pH idan> 7.5.

yo.symptoms: Interveinal chlorosis lori odo leaves, fi oju fere funfun.
yo.deficiency: Photosynthesis ti o dinku, idagba fa fifalẹ.
yo.excess: Majele lori awọn ile ekikan, didi irawọ owurọ.
yo.correction: Waye awọn chelates iron (EDDHA, DTPA), pH ti o tọ ti> 7.5.

ig.symptoms: Interveinal chlorosis na-eto eto epupụta, doo fọrọ nke nta na-acha ọcha.
ig.excess: Nsi na ala acidic, na-egbochi phosphorus.
ig.correction: Tinye iron chelates (EDDHA, DTPA), pH ziri ezi ma ọ bụrụ> 7.5.

am.symptoms: በወጣት ቅጠሎች ላይ ኢንተርቬናል ክሎሮሲስ, ነጭ ቅጠሎች ማለት ይቻላል.
am.excess: በአሲድ አፈር ላይ መርዛማነት, ፎስፎረስ መከልከል.
am.correction: የብረት ኬላቶች (ኢዲኤችኤ፣ ዲቲፒኤ)፣ ፒኤች > 7.5 ከሆነ ያርሙ።

om.symptoms: Kilooroosiin ujummoo gidduu baala dargaggoo irratti, baalli adii jechuun ni danda’ama.
om.excess: Summii biyyee asiidii qabu irratti, fosfarasii ugguruu.
om.correction: Iron chelates (EDDHA, DTPA) dibadhu, pH yoo > 7.5 ta’e sirreessuu.

rw.symptoms: Indwara ya chlorose hagati yamababi akiri mato, amababi hafi yera.
rw.excess: Uburozi ku butaka bwa aside, guhagarika fosifore.
rw.correction: Koresha chelates ya fer (EDDHA, DTPA), ikosore pH niba> 7.5.

ln.symptoms: Chlorose interveinale na nkasa ya bilenge, nkasa pene na pembe.
ln.excess: Toxicité na mabele ya acide, blocage ya phosphore.
ln.correction: Pakola ba chélates ya fer (EDDHA, DTPA), bobongisa pH soki > 7,5.

sn.symptoms: Intervein chlorosis pamashizha madiki, anosiya anenge machena.
sn.excess: Toxicity paivhu rine acidic, phosphorus blocking.
sn.correction: Isa iron chelates (EDDHA, DTPA), yakarurama pH kana> 7.5.

tn.symptoms: Chlorosis ya interveinal mo matlhareng a mannye, matlhare a batla a le masweu.
tn.excess: Botlhole mo mebung e e botlha, go thibela fosforo.
tn.correction: Tshela dikheleite tsa tshipi (EDDHA, DTPA), baakanya pH fa e le > 7.5.

st.symptoms: Intervein chlorosis makhasi a manyane, e siea e batla e le tšoeu.
st.deficiency: Phokotso ea photosynthesis, khōlo e liehang.
st.excess: Chefo mobung o nang le asiti, ho thibela phosphorus.
st.correction: Sebelisa chelate ea tšepe (EDDHA, DTPA), e nepahetseng pH haeba> 7.5.

mg.symptoms: Chlorose interveinal amin'ny ravina tanora, ravina saika fotsy.
mg.deficiency: Nihena ny photosynthesis, nihena ny fitomboana.
mg.excess: Poizina amin'ny tany asidra, fanakanana phosphore.
mg.correction: Ampiharo chelate vy (EDDHA, DTPA), marina pH raha> 7,5.

wo.symptoms: Chlorose interveinelle ci xob yu ndaw yi, xob yi daanaka weex.
wo.deficiency: Fotosente bu wàññeeku, màgg gu yeex.
wo.excess: Toxisite ci suuf su asid, dafay tere fosfor.
wo.correction: Defal ay chelate fer (EDDHA, DTPA), nga jubbanti pH sudee > 7.5.

bm.symptoms: Kulorozi (chlorose interveinal) bɛ furabulu fitininw kan, a buluw bɛ ɲini ka fin.
bm.excess: Toxicité (banakisɛ) bɛ sɔrɔ asidi dugukolow kan, fosiporozɛni balili.
bm.correction: Aw bɛ nɛgɛ kelatiw (EDDHA, DTPA) kɛ a la, ka pH latilen ni > 7,5.

ts.symptoms: Interveinal chlorosis eka matluka lamantsongo, matluka ya lava ku basa.
ts.deficiency: Kuhunguteka ka photosynthesis, ku hunguta kukula.
ts.excess: Chefu eka misava leyingana acid, ku sivela phosphorus.
ts.correction: Tirhisa ti iron chelates (EDDHA, DTPA), lulamisa pH loko > 7.5.

Zn.symptoms: Feuilles petites, chlorose internervaire, enroulement, aspect en rosette.

effects.deficiency: Croissance ralentie, réduction de la floraison et fructification.
effects.excess: Toxicité possible, blocage du fer et du manganèse.

Zn.correction: Utiliser du sulfate de zinc ou des chélates, éviter les excès de phosphore.

en.symptoms: Small leaves, interveinal chlorosis, rolling, rosette appearance.
en.deficiency: Slowed growth, reduced flowering and fruiting.
en.excess: Possible toxicity, iron and manganese blockage.
en.correction: Use zinc sulfate or chelates, avoid excess phosphorus.

zh.symptoms: 叶片小，脉间失绿，卷曲，莲座状外观。
zh.deficiency: 生长缓慢，开花结果减少。
zh.excess: 可能有毒性、铁和锰堵塞。
zh.correction: 使用硫酸锌或螯合物，避免磷过量。

hi.symptoms: छोटी पत्तियां, अंतर शिरा हरित हीनता, लुढ़कती हुई, रोसेट उपस्थिति।
hi.deficiency: धीमी वृद्धि, फूल और फल कम आना।
hi.excess: संभावित विषाक्तता, लौह और मैंगनीज अवरोध।
hi.correction: जिंक सल्फेट या कीलेट का प्रयोग करें, अधिक फास्फोरस से बचें।

es.symptoms: Hojas pequeñas, clorosis intervenal, enrolladas, aspecto rosetado.
es.deficiency: Crecimiento lento, floración y fructificación reducida.
es.excess: Posible toxicidad, bloqueo de hierro y manganeso.
es.correction: Utilice sulfato de zinc o quelatos, evite el exceso de fósforo.

fr.symptoms: Feuilles petites, chlorose internervaire, enroulement, aspect en rosette.
fr.deficiency: Croissance ralentie, réduction de la floraison et fructification.
fr.excess: Toxicité possible, blocage du fer et du manganèse.
fr.correction: Utiliser du sulfate de zinc ou des chélates, éviter les excès de phosphore.

sw.symptoms: Majani madogo, chlorosis ya kati, rolling, rosette kuonekana.
sw.deficiency: Ukuaji wa polepole, kupungua kwa maua na matunda.
sw.excess: Sumu inayowezekana, kuzuia chuma na manganese.
sw.correction: Tumia sulfate ya zinki au chelates, epuka fosforasi ya ziada.

ha.symptoms: Ƙananan ganye, chlorosis na interveinal, birgima, bayyanar rosette.
ha.deficiency: Jinkirin girma, rage fure da 'ya'yan itace.
ha.excess: Mai yuwuwar guba, toshewar ƙarfe da manganese.
ha.correction: Yi amfani da zinc sulfate ko chelates, kauce wa wuce haddi na phosphorus.

yo.symptoms: Awọn ewe kekere, chlorosis interveinal, yiyi, irisi rosette.
yo.deficiency: Idagba ti o lọra, aladodo ti o dinku ati eso.
yo.excess: Owun to le majele ti, irin ati manganese blockage.
yo.correction: Lo zinc sulfate tabi chelates, yago fun apọju irawọ owurọ.

ig.symptoms: Obere akwụkwọ, chlorosis interveinal, mpịakọta, ọdịdị rosette.
ig.deficiency: Mbelata uto, mbelata okooko na mkpụrụ osisi.
ig.excess: Nsi nwere ike ime, mgbochi ígwè na manganese.
ig.correction: Jiri zinc sulfate ma ọ bụ chelates, zere oke phosphorus.

am.symptoms: ትናንሽ ቅጠሎች, interveinal chlorosis, የሚሽከረከር, የሮዜት መልክ.
am.deficiency: የዘገየ እድገት, አበባ እና ፍራፍሬ መቀነስ.
am.excess: ሊከሰት የሚችል መርዛማነት, ብረት እና ማንጋኒዝ መዘጋት.
am.correction: ዚንክ ሰልፌት ወይም ቼልስ ይጠቀሙ, ከመጠን በላይ ፎስፎረስ ያስወግዱ.

om.symptoms: Baaloonni xixiqqoo, kiloorosii ujummoo gidduu, rolling, bifa roozeetii.
om.deficiency: Guddinni suuta jechuu, daraaraa fi firii hir’isuu.
om.excess: Summii ta’uu danda’u, cufamuu ayirenii fi maangaaniziin.
om.correction: Zinc salfate ykn chelates fayyadamuu, phosphorus garmalee irraa fagaachuu.

rw.symptoms: Amababi mato, chlorose interveinal, kuzunguruka, isura ya rosette.
rw.excess: Birashoboka uburozi, ibyuma na manganese kuzibira.
rw.correction: Koresha zinc sulfate cyangwa chelates, irinde fosifore irenze.

ln.symptoms: Nkasa ya mike, chlorose interveinal, roulement, komonana ya rosette.
ln.deficiency: Bokoli ya malembe, kokita ya fololo mpe kobota mbuma.
ln.excess: Toxicité possible, blocage ya fer na manganèse.
ln.correction: Salelá sulfate de zinc to ba chélates, koboya phosphore oyo eleki.

sn.symptoms: Mashizha maduku, intervein chlorosis, rolling, rosette kuonekwa.
sn.deficiency: Kukura kunononoka, kuderera kwemaruva uye fruiting.
sn.excess: Zvinogoneka toxicity, iron uye manganese blockage.
sn.correction: Shandisa zinc sulfate kana chelates, dzivisa yakawandisa phosphorus.

tn.symptoms: Matlhare a mannye, chlorosis ya magareng ga ditshika, go pitikologa, ponagalo ya rosette.
tn.deficiency: Kgolo e e bonya, go fokotsega ga go thunya le go ungwa.
tn.excess: Botlhole jo bo ka nnang teng, go thibana ga tshipi le manganese.
tn.correction: Dirisa zinki sulfate kgotsa di-chelate, tila fosforo e e feteletseng.

st.symptoms: Makhasi a manyane, intervein chlorosis, rolling, rosette ponahalo.
st.deficiency: Khōlo e liehang, lipalesa tse fokotsehileng le fruiting.
st.excess: Chefo e ka bang teng, ho thibela tšepe le manganese.
st.correction: Sebelisa zinc sulfate kapa chelates, qoba phosphorus e feteletseng.

mg.symptoms: Ravina kely, chlorosis interveinal, mihodinkodina, endrika rosette.
mg.deficiency: Mihamitombo ny fitomboana, mihena ny voninkazo sy ny voankazo.
mg.excess: Mety misy poizina, fanakanana vy sy manganese.
mg.correction: Ampiasao ny zinc sulfate na chelates, fadio ny phosphore be loatra.

wo.symptoms: Xob yu ndaw, chlorose ci diggante sidit yi, di xalangu, di nuru rosette.
wo.deficiency: Màgg gu yeex, wàññi tóor-tóor ak meññeef.
wo.excess: Toxisite bu mëna am, wen ak mangan buy tëju.
wo.correction: Jëfandikool sulfate zinc wala chelates, moytu fosfor bu bari.

bm.symptoms: A bulu misɛnniw, kulorozi cɛmancɛ la, a bɛ wuli, a bɛ kɛ rosɛti ye.
bm.deficiency: A falenni sumaya, a falenni ni a den sɔrɔli dɔgɔyara.
bm.excess: Toxicité (banakisɛ) bɛ se ka sɔrɔ, nɛgɛ ni manganɛsi (manganese) balili.
bm.correction: Aw bɛ zinki sulfate walima kelatiw kɛ, aw bɛ aw yɛrɛ tanga fosiporozɛni tɛmɛnen ma.

ts.symptoms: Matluka lamantsongo, interveinal chlorosis, rolling, xivumbeko xa rosette.
ts.deficiency: Ku nonoka kukula, kuhunguteka ka swiluva naku mihandzu.
ts.excess: Ku nga va na chefu, ku pfaleka ka iron na manganese.
ts.correction: Tirhisa zinc sulfate kumbe ti chelates, papalata phosphorus yo tlula mpimo.

Mn.symptoms: Chlorose internervaire, taches nécrotiques, feuilles réduites.

effects.excess: Toxicité sur sols acides, inhibition du fer.

Mn.correction: Appliquer du sulfate de manganèse, ajuster le pH si trop élevé.

en.symptoms: Interveinal chlorosis, necrotic spots, reduced leaves.
en.excess: Toxicity on acidic soils, iron inhibition.
en.correction: Apply manganese sulfate, adjust pH if too high.

zh.symptoms: 叶脉间失绿，出现坏死斑点，叶片减少。
zh.deficiency: 光合作用降低，生长不良。
zh.excess: 对酸性土壤有毒性，有铁抑制作用。
zh.correction: 使用硫酸锰，如果pH值太高则调整pH值。

hi.symptoms: अंतर शिरा हरित हीनता, परिगलित धब्बे, कम होती हुई पत्तियां।
hi.excess: अम्लीय मिट्टी पर विषाक्तता, लौह अवरोध।
hi.correction: मैंगनीज सल्फेट का प्रयोग करें, यदि पीएच अधिक हो तो उसे समायोजित करें।

es.symptoms: Clorosis intervenal, manchas necróticas, hojas reducidas.
es.excess: Toxicidad en suelos ácidos, inhibición de hierro.
es.correction: Aplique sulfato de manganeso, ajuste el pH si es demasiado alto.

fr.symptoms: Chlorose internervaire, taches nécrotiques, feuilles réduites.
fr.excess: Toxicité sur sols acides, inhibition du fer.
fr.correction: Appliquer du sulfate de manganèse, ajuster le pH si trop élevé.

sw.symptoms: Chlorosisi ya kuingilia kati, matangazo ya necrotic, majani yaliyopunguzwa.
sw.excess: Sumu juu ya udongo tindikali, kuzuia chuma.
sw.correction: Weka salfati ya manganese, rekebisha pH ikiwa juu sana.

ha.symptoms: Interveinal chlorosis, necrotic spots, rage ganye.
ha.excess: Guba akan ƙasa acidic, hana ƙarfe.
ha.correction: Aiwatar manganese sulfate, daidaita pH idan yayi girma.

yo.symptoms: chlorosis interveinal, awọn aaye necrotic, awọn ewe ti o dinku.
yo.deficiency: Photosynthesis dinku, idagbasoke ti ko dara.
yo.excess: Majele lori awọn ile ekikan, idinamọ irin.
yo.correction: Waye sulfate manganese, ṣatunṣe pH ti o ba ga ju.

ig.symptoms: Interveinal chlorosis, necrotic tụrụ, mbelata epupụta.
ig.excess: Nsi na ala acidic, mgbochi ígwè.
ig.correction: Tinye manganese sulfate, gbanwee pH ma ọ bụrụ na ọ dị elu.

am.symptoms: ኢንተርቬንታል ክሎሮሲስ, የኔክሮቲክ ነጠብጣቦች, የተቀነሱ ቅጠሎች.
am.excess: በአሲድ አፈር ላይ መርዛማነት, የብረት መከልከል.
am.correction: ማንጋኒዝ ሰልፌት ይተግብሩ ፣ በጣም ከፍ ያለ ከሆነ ፒኤች ያስተካክሉ።

om.symptoms: Kilooroosii ujummoo gidduu, tuqaawwan neekrootikii, baalli hir’ate.
om.excess: Summii biyyee asiidii qabu irratti, ayirenii dhorkuu.
om.correction: Mangaaniz salfeet dibadhu, yoo baay’ee olka’e pH sirreessaa.

rw.symptoms: Chlorose yo hagati, ibibara bya nekrotike, amababi yagabanutse.
rw.excess: Uburozi kubutaka bwa acide, kubuza ibyuma.
rw.correction: Koresha sulfate ya manganese, hindura pH niba ari ndende cyane.

ln.symptoms: Chlorose interveinale, ba taches nécrotiques, nkasa oyo ekitisami.
ln.excess: Toxicité na mabele ya acide, inhibition ya fer.
ln.correction: Pakola sulfate ya manganèse, bongisa pH soki eleki mingi.

sn.symptoms: Intervein chlorosis, necrotic mavara, akaderedzwa mashizha.
sn.excess: Toxicity paivhu rine acidic, iron inhibition.
sn.correction: Isa manganese sulfate, gadzirisa pH kana yakawandisa.

tn.symptoms: Chlorosis ya methapo, matheba a necrotic, makhasi a fokoditsweng.
tn.deficiency: Go fokotsega ga photosynthesis, kgolo e e bokoa.
tn.excess: Botlhole mo mebung e e asiti, thibelo ya tshipi.
tn.correction: Tshela manganese sulfate, fetola pH fa e le kwa godimo thata.

st.symptoms: Intervein chlorosis, matheba a necrotic, makhasi a fokotsehileng.
st.deficiency: Phokotso ea photosynthesis, kholo e fokolang.
st.excess: Chefo mobung o nang le asiti, ho thibela tšepe.
st.correction: Kenya manganese sulfate, fetola pH haeba e phahame haholo.

mg.symptoms: chlorosis interveinal, pentina necrotic, ravina mihena.
mg.excess: Poizina amin'ny tany asidra, fanakanana vy.
mg.correction: Ampiharo sulfate manganese, amboary ny pH raha avo loatra.

wo.symptoms: Chlorose interveine, tombi nekrotik, xob yu wàññeeku.
wo.deficiency: Fotosente bu wàññeeku, màgg gu bon.
wo.excess: Toxisite ci suuf yu asid, tere wen.
wo.correction: Defal sulfate manganèse, nga jekkal pH bi sudee dafa yéeg lool.

bm.symptoms: Kulorozi cɛmancɛ la, nɔ minnu bɛ mɔgɔ faga, furabuluw bɛ dɔgɔya.
bm.excess: Toxicité (banakisɛ) bɛ sɔrɔ asidi dugukolow kan, nɛgɛ balili.
bm.correction: Aw bɛ manganɛsi sulfate kɛ a la, ka pH ladilan ni a ka ca kojugu.

ts.symptoms: Chlorosis ya le xikarhi ka misiha, swivati ​​swa necrotic, matluka lawa ya hungutiweke.
ts.deficiency: Kuhunguteka ka photosynthesis, kukula lokunga kahle.
ts.excess: Chefu eka misava leyingana acid, ku sivela iron.
ts.correction: Chela manganese sulfate, lulamisa pH loko yi tlakukile swinene.

Cu.symptoms: Feuilles chlorotiques, croissance ralentie, mauvaise floraison.

effects.deficiency: Réduction du rendement, faible résistance aux maladies.
effects.excess: Toxicité, inhibition du fer et du molybdène.

Cu.correction: Utiliser du sulfate de cuivre, éviter les accumulations dans les sols.

en.symptoms: Chlorotic leaves, slow growth, poor flowering.
en.excess: Toxicity, inhibition of iron and molybdenum.
en.correction: Use copper sulfate, avoid accumulations in soils.

zh.symptoms: 叶片褪绿，生长缓慢，开花不良。
zh.excess: 毒性，对铁和钼有抑制作用。
zh.correction: 使用硫酸铜，避免在土壤中积累。

hi.symptoms: क्लोरोटिक पत्तियां, धीमी वृद्धि, खराब फूल।
hi.deficiency: कम उपज, कम रोग प्रतिरोधक क्षमता।
hi.excess: विषाक्तता, लौह और मोलिब्डेनम का अवरोध।
hi.correction: कॉपर सल्फेट का प्रयोग करें, मिट्टी में जमाव से बचें।

es.symptoms: Hojas cloróticas, crecimiento lento, floración pobre.
es.deficiency: Rendimiento reducido, baja resistencia a las enfermedades.
es.excess: Toxicidad, inhibición del hierro y molibdeno.
es.correction: Utilizar sulfato de cobre, evitar acumulaciones en suelos.

fr.symptoms: Feuilles chlorotiques, croissance ralentie, mauvaise floraison.
fr.deficiency: Réduction du rendement, faible résistance aux maladies.
fr.excess: Toxicité, inhibition du fer et du molybdène.
fr.correction: Utiliser du sulfate de cuivre, éviter les accumulations dans les sols.

sw.symptoms: Majani ya klorotiki, ukuaji wa polepole, maua duni.
sw.deficiency: Kupunguza mavuno, upinzani mdogo wa magonjwa.
sw.excess: Sumu, kizuizi cha chuma na molybdenum.
sw.correction: Tumia sulfate ya shaba, epuka mkusanyiko kwenye udongo.

ha.symptoms: Ganyen chlorotic, jinkirin girma, fure mara kyau.
ha.deficiency: Rage yawan amfanin ƙasa, ƙarancin juriya na cuta.
ha.correction: Yi amfani da jan karfe sulfate, kauce wa tarawa a cikin ƙasa.

yo.symptoms: Awọn ewe chlorotic, idagbasoke ti o lọra, aladodo ti ko dara.
yo.deficiency: Idinku ti o dinku, idaabobo arun kekere.
yo.excess: Majele, idinamọ ti irin ati molybdenum.
yo.correction: Lo imi-ọjọ imi-ọjọ, yago fun ikojọpọ ni awọn ile.

ig.symptoms: Akwụkwọ chlorotic, uto ngwa ngwa, ifuru na-adịghị mma.
ig.excess: Nsi, mgbochi nke ígwè na molybdenum.
ig.correction: Jiri ọla kọpa sulfate, zere mkpokọta na ala.

am.symptoms: ክሎሮቲክ ቅጠሎች, ዘገምተኛ እድገት, ደካማ አበባ.
am.correction: የመዳብ ሰልፌት ይጠቀሙ, በአፈር ውስጥ መከማቸትን ያስወግዱ.

om.symptoms: Baalli kiloorootikii, guddina suuta, daraaraa gaarii hin qabne.
om.deficiency: Omisha hir’achuu, dhukkuba ofirraa ittisuu gadi aanaa.
om.correction: Kooppaar salfeet fayyadamuu, biyyee keessatti kuufamuu irraa fagaachuu.

rw.symptoms: Amababi ya Chlorotic, gukura gahoro, indabyo mbi.
rw.correction: Koresha sulfate y'umuringa, irinde kwirundanyiriza mu butaka.

ln.symptoms: Nkasa ya chlorotique, kokola malembe, fololo ya mabe.
ln.deficiency: Bokiti ya mbuma, bozangi bokasi ya bokono.
ln.excess: Toxicité, inhibition ya fer na molybdène.
ln.correction: Salelá sulfate ya cuivre, koboya ba accumulations na mabele.

sn.symptoms: Chlorotic mashizha, kunonoka kukura, kuderera kwemaruva.
sn.correction: Shandisa copper sulfate, dzivisa kuunganidza muvhu.

tn.symptoms: Matlhare a chlorotic, kgolo e e bonya, go thunya go go bokoa.
tn.deficiency: Thobo e e fokoditsweng, kganetso e e kwa tlase ya malwetse.
tn.excess: Botlhole, thibelo ya tshipi le molybdenum.
tn.correction: Dirisa copper sulfate, tila go kgobokana mo mebung.

st.symptoms: Makhasi a chlorotic, kholo e liehang, lipalesa tse mpe.
st.deficiency: Kotulo e fokotsehileng, ho hanyetsa mafu a tlaase.
st.excess: Chefo, ho thibela tšepe le molybdenum.
st.correction: Sebelisa sulfate ea koporo, qoba ho bokellana mobung.

mg.symptoms: Ny ravina chlorotic, miadana ny fitomboana, ny voninkazo ratsy.
mg.deficiency: Mihena ny vokatra, ambany ny fanoherana ny aretina.
mg.excess: Poizina, fanakanana ny vy sy molybdène.
mg.correction: Mampiasà sulfate varahina, misoroka ny fanangonana amin'ny tany.

wo.symptoms: Xob yu chlorotic, màgg bu yeex, tóor-tóor bu baaxul.
wo.correction: Jëfandikool sulfate de cuivre, moytu mu dajaloo ci suuf si.

bm.symptoms: Kulorotiki buluw, u bɛ falen dɔɔni dɔɔni, u falen man ɲi.
bm.deficiency: Sɛnɛfɛnw sɔrɔli dɔgɔyali, banaw kunbɛncogo dɔgɔya.
bm.correction: Aw bɛ kuran sulfate kɛ, aw kana a dalajɛ dugukolow la.

ts.symptoms: Matluka ya chlorotic, ya kula hiku nonoka, ku pfumala swiluva.
ts.deficiency: Kuhunguteka ka mbuyelo, ku lwisana na mavabyi yale hansi.
ts.excess: Chefu, ku sivela iron na molybdenum.
ts.correction: Tirhisa copper sulfate, papalata ku hlengeletiwa eka misava.

B.symptoms: Feuilles cassantes, croissance terminale arrêtée, fruits déformés.
B.correction: Appliquer du borax ou acide borique à faible dose, éviter les excès.

en.symptoms: Brittle leaves, stunted terminal growth, deformed fruits.
en.correction: Apply borax or boric acid in small doses, avoid excess.

zh.symptoms: 叶片脆弱，顶端生长发育不良，果实畸形。
zh.excess: 经常出现毒性，叶子灼伤。
zh.correction: 少量使用硼砂或硼酸，避免过量。

hi.symptoms: भंगुर पत्तियां, अवरुद्ध अंतिम विकास, विकृत फल।
hi.correction: बोरेक्स या बोरिक एसिड की छोटी खुराक का प्रयोग करें, अधिक मात्रा से बचें।

es.symptoms: Hojas quebradizas, crecimiento terminal atrofiado, frutos deformados.
es.excess: Toxicidad frecuente, quemaduras en las hojas.
es.correction: Aplicar bórax o ácido bórico en pequeñas dosis, evitar el exceso.

fr.symptoms: Feuilles cassantes, croissance terminale arrêtée, fruits déformés.
fr.correction: Appliquer du borax ou acide borique à faible dose, éviter les excès.

sw.symptoms: Majani ya brittle, ukuaji wa mwisho uliodumaa, matunda yaliyoharibika.
sw.deficiency: Matunda ya chini, kupungua kwa mavuno.
sw.excess: Sumu ya mara kwa mara, kuchoma kwa majani.
sw.correction: Omba borax au asidi ya boroni kwa dozi ndogo, epuka kupita kiasi.

ha.symptoms: Ganyen ganyaye, stunted m girma, 'ya'yan itace maras kyau.
ha.deficiency: Low fruiting, rage yawan amfanin ƙasa.
ha.correction: Aiwatar da borax ko boric acid a cikin ƙananan allurai, kauce wa wuce haddi.

yo.symptoms: Awọn ewe brittle, idagba ebute gbigbẹ, awọn eso ti o bajẹ.
yo.deficiency: Eso kekere, ikore ti o dinku.
yo.correction: Waye borax tabi boric acid ni awọn iwọn kekere, yago fun apọju.

ig.symptoms: Akwụkwọ na-ekukukuku, stunted terminal ito, mkpụrụ osisi ndị nwere nkwarụ.
ig.deficiency: Mkpụrụ osisi dị ala, mbelata mkpụrụ.
ig.correction: Tinye borax ma ọ bụ boric acid na obere doses, zere ngafe.

am.symptoms: የተበጣጠሱ ቅጠሎች, የዘገየ የእድገት እድገት, የተበላሹ ፍራፍሬዎች.
am.correction: ቦርክስ ወይም ቦሪ አሲድ በትንሽ መጠን ይተግብሩ, ከመጠን በላይ ያስወግዱ.

om.symptoms: Baaloonni cabbii, guddina xumuraa kan dhaabbate, firiiwwan bocaman.
om.correction: Booraaksii ykn asiidii booriik doosiin xiqqaadhaan dibachuu, garmalee irraa fagaachuu.

rw.symptoms: Amababi yamenetse, gukura gukura kwimbuto, imbuto zahinduwe.
rw.correction: Koresha borax cyangwa aside ya boric mukigero gito, irinde kurenza.

ln.symptoms: Nkasa ya kobukana, bokoli ya nsuka oyo ekangami te, mbuma oyo ebebi.
ln.deficiency: Kobota mbuma mingi te, mbuma ekiti.
ln.excess: Toxicité mbala na mbala, kozika ya nkasa.
ln.correction: Pakola borax to acide borique na ba doses ya mike, koboya kolekisa ndelo.

sn.symptoms: Brittle mashizha, stunted terminal kukura, akaremara michero.
sn.correction: Isa borax kana boric acid mune zviduku zvishoma, dzivisa kudarika.

tn.symptoms: Matlhare a a thubegang, kgolo e e sa tlhomamang, maungo a a sa itekanelang.
tn.deficiency: Go ungwa ga maungo a a kwa tlase, kumo e e fokotsegileng.
tn.excess: Botlhole jwa kgapetsakgapetsa, go fisiwa ga matlhare.
tn.correction: Dirisa borax kgotsa boric acid ka ditekanyetso tse dinnye, tila go feta selekanyo.

st.symptoms: Makhasi a brittle, kholo e khutsitseng, litholoana tse holofetseng.
st.deficiency: Litholoana tse fokolang, lihlahisoa tse fokolang.
st.excess: Hangata chefo, ho chesoa ha makhasi.
st.correction: Etsa kopo ea borax kapa boric acid ka tekanyo e nyane, qoba ho feteletseng.

mg.symptoms: Raviny malemy, tapaka ny fitomboan'ny farany, voakitika ny voankazo.
mg.correction: Asio borax na asidra borika amin'ny fatra kely, fadio ny tafahoatra.

wo.symptoms: Xob yu yomba dagg, màgg gu yeex, meññeef yu yàqu.
wo.deficiency: Fruit bu néew, meññeef bu néew.
wo.correction: Defal borax wala asid borik ci dose yu ndaw, moytu ko ëpp.

bm.symptoms: A buluw bɛ sɔgɔsɔgɔ, u bɛ falen laban na, u jiridenw bɛ tiɲɛ.
bm.deficiency: Jiridenw ka dɔgɔn, sɛnɛfɛnw sɔrɔli bɛ dɔgɔya.
bm.excess: Toxicité (banakisɛ) bɛ to a la, furabulu jeni.
bm.correction: Aw bɛ borakisi walima asidi boriki kɛ a hakɛ dɔɔni na, aw kana a caya.

ts.symptoms: Matluka ya brittle, ku tsandzeka ku kula ka makumu, mihandzu leyi onhakeke.
ts.excess: Ku tshamela ku va na chefu, ku hisiwa ka matluka.
ts.correction: Chela borax kumbe boric acid hi mimpimo leyintsongo, papalata ku tlula mpimo.

Mo.symptoms: Jaunissement des feuilles, mauvaise fixation de l’azote (légumineuses).

effects.deficiency: Réduction de la croissance, faible rendement.
effects.excess: Rare, mais peut interférer avec le cuivre.

Mo.correction: Utiliser du molybdate d’ammonium, ajuster le pH si trop acide.

en.symptoms: Yellowing of leaves, poor nitrogen fixation (legumes).
en.excess: Rare, but may interfere with copper.
en.correction: Use ammonium molybdate, adjust pH if too acidic.

zh.symptoms: 叶子变黄，固氮能力差（豆科植物）。
zh.correction: 使用钼酸铵，如果太酸则调整 pH 值。

hi.symptoms: पत्तियों का पीला पड़ना, खराब नाइट्रोजन स्थिरीकरण (फलियां)।
hi.excess: दुर्लभ, लेकिन तांबे के साथ हस्तक्षेप कर सकता है।
hi.correction: अमोनियम मोलिब्डेट का प्रयोग करें, यदि अम्लीय हो तो pH समायोजित करें।

es.symptoms: Amarillamiento de hojas, mala fijación de nitrógeno (legumbres).
es.excess: Raro, pero puede interferir con el cobre.
es.correction: Utilice molibdato de amonio, ajuste el pH si es demasiado ácido.

fr.symptoms: Jaunissement des feuilles, mauvaise fixation de l’azote (légumineuses).
fr.deficiency: Réduction de la croissance, faible rendement.
fr.excess: Rare, mais peut interférer avec le cuivre.
fr.correction: Utiliser du molybdate d’ammonium, ajuster le pH si trop acide.

sw.symptoms: Majani ya manjano, uwekaji duni wa nitrojeni (kunde).
sw.deficiency: Kupungua kwa ukuaji, mavuno ya chini.
sw.excess: Nadra, lakini inaweza kuingilia kati na shaba.
sw.correction: Tumia molybdate ya ammoniamu, rekebisha pH ikiwa ni tindikali sana.

ha.symptoms: Yellowing na ganye, matalauta nitrogen kayyade (legumes).
ha.deficiency: Rage girma, ƙananan yawan amfanin ƙasa.
ha.excess: Rare, amma yana iya tsoma baki tare da jan karfe.
ha.correction: Yi amfani da ammonium molybdate, daidaita pH idan ya yi yawa acidic.

yo.symptoms: Yellowing ti leaves, talaka nitrogen fixation (legumes).
yo.deficiency: Idagba ti o dinku, ikore kekere.
yo.excess: Toje, ṣugbọn o le dabaru pẹlu bàbà.
yo.correction: Lo ammonium molybdate, ṣatunṣe pH ti o ba jẹ ekikan pupọ.

ig.symptoms: Icha akwụkwọ na-acha odo odo, nhazi nitrogen na-adịghị mma (legumes).
ig.excess: Ọ dị ụkọ, mana ọ nwere ike igbochi ọla kọpa.
ig.correction: Jiri ammonium molybdate, gbanwee pH ma ọ bụrụ acidic.

am.excess: አልፎ አልፎ ፣ ግን በመዳብ ላይ ጣልቃ ሊገባ ይችላል።
am.correction: አሚዮኒየም ሞሊብዳት ይጠቀሙ፣ በጣም አሲዳማ ከሆነ ፒኤች ያስተካክሉ።

om.symptoms: Baalli keelloo ta’uu, naayitiroojiiniin akka hin dhaabbanne (legumes).
om.excess: Rare, garuu sibiila diimaa gidduu seenuu danda’a.
om.correction: Amooniyaamii moliibdeetii fayyadamaa, yoo garmalee asiidii ta’e pH sirreessaa.

rw.correction: Koresha ammonium molybdate, hindura pH niba ari acide cyane.

ln.symptoms: Kokóma jaune ya nkasa, fixation ya azote ya mabe (légumineuses).
ln.excess: Rare, kasi ekoki ko interférer na cuivre.
ln.correction: Salelá molybdate d’ammonium, bongisa pH soki ezali acide mingi.

sn.correction: Shandisa ammonium molybdate, gadzirisa pH kana yakanyanya acidic.

tn.symptoms: Go nna serolwana ga matlhare, go tlhomamisa ga naeterojene go go bokoa (dinawa).
tn.deficiency: Kgolô e e fokoditsweng, thobo e e kwa tlase.
tn.excess: E sa tlwaeleha, empa e ka sitisa koporo.
tn.correction: Dirisa amoniamo molibdate, fetola pH fa e le esiti thata.

st.symptoms: Ho ba mosehla ha makhasi, ho futhumala ha naetrojene (legumes).
st.deficiency: Khōlo e fokotsehileng, chai e tlaase.
st.excess: E sa tloaelehang, empa e ka kena-kenana le koporo.
st.correction: Sebelisa ammonium molybdate, fetola pH haeba e le asiti haholo.

mg.symptoms: Mavo ny raviny, mahantra azota fixation (legioma).
mg.deficiency: Nihena ny fitomboana, ambany ny vokatra.
mg.excess: Tsy fahita firy, fa mety hanelingelina ny varahina.
mg.correction: Ampiasao ammonium molybdate, amboary ny pH raha asidra loatra.

wo.symptoms: Xob yi dañuy mboq, azot bi du am doole (legume yi).
wo.deficiency: Màgg gu wàññeeku, meññeef gu néew.
wo.excess: Rare, waaye mën na jaxasoo ak përëm.
wo.correction: Jëfandikool molibdat amonium, nga xaw pH sudee asid lool.

bm.excess: A man teli, nka a bɛ se ka nɛgɛ bali.
bm.correction: Aw bɛ amoniyɔmu molibdati kɛ, ka pH ladilan ni asidi bɛ a la kojugu.

ts.symptoms: Ku tshwuka ka matluka, ku nga tshamiseki kahle ka nitrogen (legumes).
ts.deficiency: Kuhunguteka ka kukula, mbuyelo wale hansi.
ts.excess: A swi talanga, kambe swi nga ha kavanyeta koporo.
ts.correction: Tirhisa ammonium molybdate, lulamisa pH loko yiri na acid yotala.

Cl.symptoms: Flétrissement, chlorose, réduction de la taille des feuilles.

effects.excess: Toxicité fréquente en irrigation, brûlure foliaire.

Cl.correction: Utiliser des engrais contenant du chlorure si nécessaire, surveiller la salinité.

en.symptoms: Wilting, chlorosis, reduction in leaf size.
en.excess: Frequent toxicity in irrigation, leaf burn.
en.correction: Use chloride-containing fertilizers if necessary, monitor salinity.

zh.deficiency: 光合作用降低，生长不良。
zh.excess: 灌溉时经常发生毒性作用，引起叶片灼伤。
zh.correction: 必要时使用含氯肥料，监测盐度。

hi.symptoms: मुरझाना, हरित हीनता, पत्ती के आकार में कमी।
hi.excess: सिंचाई में बार-बार विषाक्तता, पत्ती जलना।
hi.correction: यदि आवश्यक हो तो क्लोराइड युक्त उर्वरकों का प्रयोग करें, लवणता पर नजर रखें।

es.symptoms: Marchitez, clorosis, reducción del tamaño de las hojas.
es.excess: Toxicidad frecuente en riego, quemadura de hojas.
es.correction: Si es necesario, utilice fertilizantes que contengan cloruro y controle la salinidad.

fr.symptoms: Flétrissement, chlorose, réduction de la taille des feuilles.
fr.excess: Toxicité fréquente en irrigation, brûlure foliaire.
fr.correction: Utiliser des engrais contenant du chlorure si nécessaire, surveiller la salinité.

sw.symptoms: Wilting, chlorosis, kupunguza ukubwa wa majani.
sw.excess: Sumu ya mara kwa mara katika umwagiliaji, kuchoma majani.
sw.correction: Tumia mbolea zenye kloridi ikiwa ni lazima, fuatilia chumvi.

ha.excess: Yawan yawan guba a cikin ban ruwa, ƙone ganye.
ha.correction: Yi amfani da takin mai ɗauke da chloride idan ya cancanta, saka idanu da gishiri.

yo.symptoms: Witing, chlorosis, idinku ninu iwọn ewe.
yo.deficiency: Photosynthesis dinku, idagbasoke ti ko dara.
yo.excess: Majele ti loorekoore ni irigeson, sisun ewe.
yo.correction: Lo awọn ajile ti o ni kiloraidi ti o ba jẹ dandan, ṣe atẹle iyọ.

ig.symptoms: Ịkwụsị, chlorosis, mbelata nke akwukwo akwukwo.
ig.excess: Ugboro nsi na ogbugba mmiri n'ubi, akwụkwọ ọkụ.
ig.correction: Jiri fatịlaịza nwere chloride ma ọ bụrụ na ọ dị mkpa, lelee salinity.

am.excess: በመስኖ ውስጥ በተደጋጋሚ መርዛማነት, ቅጠል ይቃጠላል.
am.correction: አስፈላጊ ከሆነ ክሎራይድ የያዙ ማዳበሪያዎችን ይጠቀሙ, ጨዋማነትን ይቆጣጠሩ.

om.excess: Jallisii keessatti summii yeroo baay’ee, gubachuu baala.
om.correction: Yoo barbaachisaa ta’e xaa’oo kilooraayidii of keessaa qabu fayyadamuu, soogidda hordofuu.

rw.excess: Uburozi bukabije mu kuhira, gutwika amababi.
rw.correction: Koresha ifumbire irimo chloride nibiba ngombwa, ukurikirane umunyu.

ln.symptoms: Kopɔla, chlorose, kokitisa bonene ya nkasa.
ln.excess: Toxicité mbala na mbala na irrigation, kozika ya nkasa.
ln.correction: Salelá ba engrais oyo ezali na chlorure soki esengeli, bolanda salinité.

sn.correction: Shandisa mafetireza ane chloride kana zvichidikanwa, tarisa salinity.

tn.symptoms: Go swaba, chlorosis, phokotsego ya bogolo jwa matlhare.
tn.deficiency: Go fokotsega ga photosynthesis, kgolo e e bokoa.
tn.excess: Botlhole jwa kgapetsakgapetsa mo nosetsong, go fisiwa ga matlhare.
tn.correction: Dirisa menontsha e e nang le chloride fa go tlhokega, ela tlhoko letswai.

st.symptoms: Wilting, chlorosis, ho fokotseha ha boholo ba makhasi.
st.deficiency: Phokotso ea photosynthesis, kholo e fokolang.
st.excess: Khafetsa chefo ka nosetso, lekhasi chesa.
st.correction: Sebelisa menontsha e nang le chloride ha ho hlokahala, hlokomela letsoai.

mg.deficiency: Mihena ny photosynthesis, tsy fahampian'ny fitomboana.
mg.excess: Poizina matetika amin'ny fanondrahana, may ny ravina.
mg.correction: Mampiasà zezika misy klôro raha ilaina, manara-maso ny salinity.

wo.symptoms: Woy, chlorose, wàññi dayo xob yi.
wo.deficiency: Fotosente bu wàññeeku, màgg gu bon.
wo.excess: Toxisite bu bari ci irigaasioŋ, lakk xob.
wo.correction: Jëfandikool fertilisan te am chlore su ko jaree, nga xool salinite bi.

bm.excess: Toxicité (banakisɛ) bɛ to ka kɛ jiko la, furabulu jeni.
bm.correction: Aw bɛ bagajiw kɛ minnu kɔnɔ kuloridi bɛ sɔrɔ ni a mago bɛ a la, aw bɛ kɔgɔ kɔlɔsi.

ts.symptoms: Ku bola, chlorosis, kuhunguteka ka vukulu bya matluka.
ts.deficiency: Kuhunguteka ka photosynthesis, kukula lokunga kahle.
ts.excess: Kutala kuva na chefu eka ku cheleta, ku hisiwa ka matluka.
ts.correction: Tirhisa manyoro lawa yanga na chloride loko swilaveka, languta munyu.

Ni.symptoms: Accumulation d’urée dans les feuilles, chlorose, croissance ralentie.
Ni.correction: Utiliser des microdoses de nickel si nécessaire, éviter les sols contaminés.

en.symptoms: Accumulation of urea in the leaves, chlorosis, slowed growth.
en.correction: Use microdoses of nickel if necessary, avoid contaminated soils.

zh.symptoms: 叶片中尿素积累，失绿，生长减慢。
zh.correction: 必要时使用微剂量的镍，避免土壤受到污染。

hi.symptoms: पत्तियों में यूरिया का संचय, हरित हीनता, धीमी वृद्धि।
hi.correction: यदि आवश्यक हो तो निकेल की सूक्ष्म खुराक का प्रयोग करें, दूषित मिट्टी से बचें।

es.symptoms: Acumulación de urea en las hojas, clorosis, crecimiento lento.
es.correction: Utilizar microdosis de níquel si es necesario, evitar suelos contaminados.

fr.symptoms: Accumulation d’urée dans les feuilles, chlorose, croissance ralentie.
fr.correction: Utiliser des microdoses de nickel si nécessaire, éviter les sols contaminés.

sw.symptoms: Mkusanyiko wa urea kwenye majani, chlorosis, ukuaji wa polepole.
sw.correction: Tumia microdoses ya nikeli ikiwa ni lazima, epuka udongo uliochafuliwa.

ha.symptoms: Tarin urea a cikin ganye, chlorosis, jinkirin girma.
ha.correction: Yi amfani da microdoses na nickel idan ya cancanta, kauce wa gurɓataccen ƙasa.

yo.symptoms: Ikojọpọ ti urea ninu awọn ewe, chlorosis, idagbasoke ti o fa fifalẹ.
yo.correction: Lo microdoses ti nickel ti o ba jẹ dandan, yago fun awọn ile ti a ti doti.

ig.symptoms: Mgbakọ nke urea na epupụta, chlorosis, slowed ibu.
ig.correction: Jiri microdoses nke nickel ma ọ bụrụ na ọ dị mkpa, zere ala ndị mmetọ.

am.symptoms: በቅጠሎች ውስጥ የዩሪያ ክምችት, ክሎሮሲስ, እድገትን ይቀንሳል.
am.correction: አስፈላጊ ከሆነ የኒኬል ማይክሮዶዝ ይጠቀሙ, የተበከለ አፈርን ያስወግዱ.

om.symptoms: Kuufamni yuuriyaa baala keessatti, kilooroosii, guddina saffisiise.
om.correction: Yoo barbaachisaa ta’e maaykiroodoozii niikeelii fayyadamuu, biyyee faalame irraa fagaachuu.

rw.symptoms: Kwiyongera kwa urea mumababi, chlorose, gutinda gukura.
rw.correction: Koresha microdose ya nikel nibiba ngombwa, irinde ubutaka bwanduye.

ln.symptoms: Accumulation ya urée na nkasa, chlorose, ekitisaki bokoli.
ln.correction: Salelá ba microdoses ya nickel soki esengeli, koboya mabele oyo ezali na mikrobe.

sn.symptoms: Kuunganidza urea mumashizha, chlorosis, kunonoka kukura.
sn.correction: Shandisa mamicrodoses e nickel kana zvichidikanwa, dzivisa ivhu rakasvibiswa.

tn.symptoms: Pokello ea urea ka makhasi a, chlorosis, butle kgolo.
tn.deficiency: Go kgoreletsega ga phetogo ya naeterojene.
tn.correction: Dirisa di-microdose tsa nickel fa go tlhokega, tila mebu e e kgotletsweng.

st.symptoms: Ho bokellana ha urea makhasi, chlorosis, ho liehisa kholo.
st.deficiency: Ho senyeha ha metabolism ea nitrogen.
st.correction: Sebelisa li-microdoses tsa nickel ha ho hlokahala, qoba mobu o silafetseng.

mg.symptoms: Ny fanangonana ny urea ao amin'ny ravina, ny chlorosis, ny fitomboana miadana.
mg.correction: Mampiasà microdoses nikela raha ilaina, fadio ny tany maloto.

wo.symptoms: Dajale uree ci xob yi, chlorose, màgg gu yeex.
wo.correction: Jëfandikool microdose nickel su ko jaree, moytu suuf yu tilim.

bm.symptoms: Ureya dalajɛli furabuluw la, kulorozi, o bɛ bonya sumaya.
bm.correction: Aw bɛ nikɛri hakɛ fitininw kɛ ni a mago bɛ a la, aw bɛ aw yɛrɛ tanga bɔgɔ nɔgɔlenw ma.

ts.symptoms: Ku hlengeletiwa ka urea eka matluka, chlorosis, swihungute kukula.
ts.deficiency: Ku kavanyetiwa ka metabolism ya nitrogen.
ts.correction: Tirhisa ti microdoses ta nickel loko swilaveka, papalata misava leyi thyakeke.

Co.symptoms: Fixation de l’azote réduite (légumineuses), croissance ralentie.
Co.correction: Appliquer du sulfate de cobalt, surveiller le pH et les interactions.

en.correction: Apply cobalt sulfate, monitor pH and interactions.

zh.symptoms: 减少氮固定（豆科植物），减缓生长。
zh.correction: 施用硫酸钴，监测 pH 值和相互作用。

hi.symptoms: नाइट्रोजन स्थिरीकरण में कमी (फलियां), विकास धीमा।
hi.correction: कोबाल्ट सल्फेट का प्रयोग करें, pH और अन्योन्यक्रियाओं की निगरानी करें।

es.symptoms: Fijación reducida de nitrógeno (legumbres), crecimiento ralentizado.
es.correction: Aplicar sulfato de cobalto, controlar el pH y las interacciones.

fr.symptoms: Fixation de l’azote réduite (légumineuses), croissance ralentie.
fr.correction: Appliquer du sulfate de cobalt, surveiller le pH et les interactions.

sw.symptoms: Kupunguza uwekaji wa nitrojeni (kunde), kupunguza ukuaji.
sw.correction: Omba sulfate ya cobalt, fuatilia pH na mwingiliano.

ha.deficiency: Low yawan amfanin ƙasa, matalauta nodulation.
ha.correction: Aiwatar da cobalt sulfate, saka idanu pH da hulɗa.

yo.symptoms: Idinku nitrogen ti o dinku (legumes), idagbasoke ti o fa fifalẹ.
yo.deficiency: Ikore kekere, nodulation ti ko dara.
yo.excess: Majele ti o ṣeeṣe, idinamọ irin.
yo.correction: Waye koluboti imi-ọjọ, atẹle pH ati awọn ibaraenisepo.

ig.deficiency: Mkpụrụ dị ala, nodulation adịghị mma.
ig.excess: Nsi nwere ike ime, mgbochi ígwè.
ig.correction: Tinye cobalt sulfate, nyochaa pH na mmekọrịta.

am.correction: ኮባልት ሰልፌት ይተግብሩ፣ ፒኤች እና መስተጋብርን ይቆጣጠሩ።

om.deficiency: Omisha xiqqaa, noodulation gaarii hin taane.
om.correction: Koobaalt salfeet dibachuu, pH fi wal-nyaatinsa hordofuu.

rw.correction: Koresha cobalt sulfate, ukurikirane pH n'imikoranire.

ln.symptoms: Bokiti ya fixation ya azote (ba légumineuses), bokoli ya malembe.
ln.correction: Pakola sulfate de cobalt, suivre pH na ba interactions.

sn.correction: Isa cobalt sulfate, tarisa pH uye kupindirana.

tn.symptoms: Fokoditswe go tlhomamisa naeterojene (dinawa), kgolo e e bonya.
tn.deficiency: Thobo e e kwa tlase, nodulation e e bokoa.
tn.excess: Botlhole jo bo ka nnang teng, thibelo ya tshipi.
tn.correction: Dirisa cobalt sulfate, ela tlhoko pH le ditirisano.

st.symptoms: Phokotso ea nitrogen fixation (legumes), khōlo e liehang.
st.deficiency: Kotulo e tlaase, nodulation e fokolang.
st.excess: Chefo e ka bang teng, ho thibela tšepe.
st.correction: Sebelisa cobalt sulfate, hlokomela pH le litšebelisano.

mg.symptoms: Nihena ny azota fixation (legioma), nihena ny fitomboana.
mg.deficiency: Ny vokatra ambany, ny nodulation mahantra.
mg.correction: Ampiharo sulfate kobalta, manara-maso ny pH sy ny fifandraisana.

wo.symptoms: Wàññi fiksaasioŋ azot (legume), màgg gu yeex.
wo.deficiency: Ndax lu néew, nodulation bu baaxul.
wo.excess: Toxisite bu mëna am, tere fer.
wo.correction: Defal kobalt sulfate, nga saytu pH bi ak jaxasoo bi.

bm.symptoms: Azote jɔli dɔgɔyali (legumes), ka bonya sumaya.
bm.deficiency: Sɛnɛfɛnw sɔrɔli dɔgɔya, nodulation man ɲi.
bm.excess: Toxicité (banakisɛ) bɛ se ka sɔrɔ, nɛgɛ balili.
bm.correction: Aw bɛ kobalt sulfate kɛ a la, ka pH ni a ni ɲɔgɔn cɛ jɛɲɔgɔnyaw kɔlɔsi.

ts.symptoms: Kuhunguteka ka nitrogen fixation (legumes), kuhunguteka kukula.
ts.deficiency: Mbuyelo wale hansi, nodulation yoka yingari kahle.
ts.excess: Chefu leyi nga kotekaka, ku sivela ka ayoni.
ts.correction: Tirhisa cobalt sulfate, languta pH na ku tirhisana.
